 ho agu fi koraa. Ɔka wɔ saa adehu yi ho se, “Na ahoɔden bi anka me mu, na m’ahoɔfɛ dan yɛɛ mmɔbɔmɔbɔ, na mannya ahoɔden biara.” Dan. 10:8. Ɔkara a aniso-adehu yi tɔ ne so no bɛpo pɛsɛmenkominya, honam akɔnnɔ, na ɔnam Kristo trenee so bɛhwehwɛ komam-tew a ɛne Onyame mmara ne Kristo suban kɔ pɛ no akyi kwan.KN 24.3
Paulo ka se, “Mmara mu trenee fam, wɔannunu me.” (Fil. 3 : 6.) Eyi kyerɛ ɔhonam fam de; na honhom fam de ohuu sɛ ɔyɛ ɔdebɔneyɛfo. Sɛ yɛfa no wiase fam a, Paulo huu sɛ bɔne bi nni ne ho
...
o beberebe.” Na Simon buae sɛ, “misusu sɛ nea ɔde beberebe kyɛɛ no no.” Luka 7 : 43. Yayɛ nnebɔneyɛfo kɛse, na Kristo wui ma yɛanya bɔne fafiri. N’ahummobo afɔrebɔ no tumi gyina yɛn anan mu Agya no anim. Wɔn a Ɔde bɔne beberee akyɛ wɔn no bɛdɔ No pii, na wɔabɛn Nahennua no ho ayi Ne dɔ kɛse ne N’afɔrebo a enni kabea no ayɛ. Sɛ yɛte Onyankopɔn dɔ kɛse no ase wie a, ɛma yehu sɛnea bɔne tan a ɛyɛ te. Sɛ yehu sɛnea ɔdɔ hama no te, na yɛte Kristo afɔrebo nwonwa no ase a, ɛma yenya ahunnu kese.KN 30.1

1 Korinti 1
1Me Pɔɔlo ɔbono Kirisito Yesu gi tɔgɛ me yɛɛ nꞌ baa wɔra mɔ-ɔsɔɔ kyu lii Wurubuaarɛ gɛlaarɛ so mɔ ne n ŋmarasɛ gɛnen ɔwolɛ baarɛ. Me‑rɛ Sositɛni, aye-nanbo Yesu ɔson mɔ dɔ, ne n kyu ɔwolɛ baarɛ bunge 2fɛye abono fɛ kya son Wurubuaarɛ kyu naa de Yesu so Korinti ɔsowolɛ so mɔ. Kyu lii fɛye‑rɛ Kirisito Yesu ginyamesɛ kolon mɔ so mɔ, Wurubuaarɛ gi lɔrɔ fɛye yela sa mɔ-nyoro, ne ɔ tɔgɛ fɛye yɛɛ fɛꞌ lɔrɔ fɛye-nwɔnsa dɔ yela sa mɔ, ne i mɛŋ gyɛ fɛye-wolɛ. Fɛye‑rɛ abono pɛwu mɛ kya saawo ter
... 
 iꞌ ba yɛɛ me-atɔngɛbi a kya dengɛ asa nwɔnsa lii Yesu lɛwu oyii mɔ so de iꞌ ba yɛɛ mɛŋ nyɛ amɔlɛgɛ lii mɔ-lɛwu mɔ so.
Wurubuaarɛ-Lɛɛ Ɔlaako Ginyi
18I lii fɛɛ abono mɛ kya fuɛ mɔmɔ-lɛwu gɛmara mɔ, Wurubuaarɛ ɔkalan kyu lii Yesu lɛwu mɔ so mɔ gyɛ daa ilaa gyaga sa ɔmɔ. Aye abono Wurubuaarɛ ti ɔ kya mɔlɛgɛ aye mɔ berɛ, Wurubuaarɛ ɔkalan kyu lii Yesu lɛwu mɔ so mɔ kya sa aye Wurubuaarɛ Oduduu dɔ ɔlon. 19Wurubuaarɛ gi yɛgɛ mɛ ŋmarasɛ imɔ idɛ so ilaa yela mɔ-agyɛbi mɔ dɔ yɛɛ,
“Nan nyida anyamesɛ-lɛɛ 
...
 30Wurubuaarɛ ne n yɛgɛ ne aye‑rɛ Kirisito Yesu a nyɛ wɔra nyamesɛ kolon faa. Ne kyu naa de Yesu so ne a kya nyɛ ɔlaako ginyi ne Wurubuaarɛ kya kyu yɛɛ aye-asen dɔ i boran sa mɔ. Kyu naa de Yesu so ne aye-asen a kya kii lɔrɔ fuuli too, ne a nyɛ aye-nyoro lii ilaa nyɛnyɛn pɛwu gɛmu mɔ abaa dɔ a san a tɛ sa Wurubuaarɛ faa. 31Imɔso i kaaborɛ aꞌ nu ilaa ibono mɛ wolaa ŋmarasɛ Wurubuaarɛ agyɛbi dɔ mɔ. Mɛ ŋmarasɛ yɛɛ, “Ɔbono ɔ laa nyiile mɔ-nyoro mɔ, ɔꞌ nyiile mɔ-nyoro kyu naa de aye-Wura belɛ mɔ so.”

Tranquillityy
Saa tumbler yi yɛ ade a eye kyɛn so a wubetumi de adi dwuma da biara da na ama 20oz a w’ani gye ho no ayɛ hyew anaasɛ ayɛ nwini esiane ɔfasu abien a wɔde siw ano nti. Saa bere yi nyinaa, dade a ɛnyɛ den adansi no ma ɛyɛ den yiye na ɛyɛ nkuku hohoro ahobammɔ ma ɛyɛ mmerɛw kɛse.

Dwom 48
Koramma dwom.
1Awurade yɛ ɔkɛse na ɔsɛ nkamfo,
wɔ yɛn Nyankopɔn kuropɔn mu, ne bepɔw kronkron so.
2Ne sorokɔ ma ɛyɛ fɛ,
ɛyɛ wiase nyinaa anigyede.
Bepɔw Sion te sɛ Safon sorɔnsorɔmmea,
Ɔhenkɛse no kuropɔn.
3Onyankopɔn te nʼabankɛse mu
wada ne ho adi sɛ ɔyɛ nʼabandennen.
4Bere a ahemfo yi boaa wɔn ho ano,
na wotuu ɔsa bɔɔ mu no,
5wohuu no ma ɛyɛɛ wɔn ahodwiriw,
na wɔde ehu guanee.
6Wɔbɔɔ huboa wɔ hɔ,
ɔyaw a ɛte sɛ ɔbea a awo aka no.
7Wosɛe wɔn sɛ Tarsis ahyɛn a
apuei mframa abɔ adwira wɔn.
8Sɛnea yɛate no,
saa ara na yɛahu
wɔ Asafo Awurade kuropɔn no mu,
yɛn Nyankopɔn kuropɔn mu;
Onyankopɔn ma etim hɔ afebɔɔ.
9Wʼasɔredan no mu; Ao, Onyankopɔn,
na yɛdwene wo dɔ a enni huammɔ da no ho,
10Ao, Onyankopɔn, wʼayeyi du asase ano
te sɛ wo din te;
trenee ayɛ wo nsa nifa mu ma.
11Sion bepɔw di ahurusi,
Yuda nkuraase no ani gye
esiane wʼatemmu no nti.
12Nantew Sion na twa ho hyia,
kan nʼabantenten dodow,
13dwene nʼafasu ho yiye,
hwɛ nʼabankɛse no,
na woaka ho asɛm akyerɛ nkyirimma.
14Saa Onyankopɔn yi yɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn daa daa;
ɔbɛyɛ yɛn kwankyerɛfo akosi awiei mpo.

Yesu de ahonyade ho afotu pa maa n’asuafo no. Nanso ɔrekasa no, na ɛnyɛ asuafo no nko ara na ɛwɔ hɔ. Ná Farisifo no bi wɔ hɔ; wɔn nso, na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔtie Yesu afotuo no. Adɛn ntia? Efisɛ na wɔyɛ “sikanibereɛ.” Bere a wɔtee Yesu asɛm no, “wɔfirii aseɛ dii ne ho fɛ.”—Luka 15:2; 16:13, 14.
Nanso ɛno ammɔ Yesu hu. Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Mo na mobu mo ho bem nnipa anim, nanso Onyankopɔn nim mo akoma mu; ɛfiri sɛ deɛ ɛyɛ kokuroo wɔ nnipa anim no yɛ akyiwadeɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn ani so.”—Luka 16:15.
Ná Farisifo no
... 
no.’ Ná ne kɔn dɔ “nneɛma a ɛfiri ɔdefoɔ no didipono so gu fam no” mpo. Sɛnea na Lasaro ho atutu akuro no, saa ara na ahobrɛasefo no nso, na nkurɔfo mmu wɔn; ná ayɛ sɛ nea wɔn som mpo yɛ Onyankopɔn tan.
Ná saa tebea bɔne no akɔ so akyɛ, nanso na Yesu nim sɛ nsakrae kɛse bi nam kwan so reba; saa nsakrae no bɛba wɔn a wɔte sɛ ɔdefo no ne wɔn a wɔte sɛ Lasaro no asetenam.
NSRAKRAE BAA ƆDEFO NO NE LASARO ASETENAM
Afei Yesu kyerɛkyerɛɛ nsakrae kɛse a ɛbae no mu sɛ: “Ɔdesrɛfoɔ no wuiɛ na abɔfoɔ faa no
...
a wɔn ho so no, wɔbrɛɛ wɔn ase, na ahobrɛasefo a wɔgyee Yesu kɔndua toom no deɛ, wɔnyaa home na wɔbɛtee Kyerɛwnsɛm no ase. (Mateo 11:28-30) Ná aka abosome kakraa bi ama wɔde apam foforo no asi Mmara apam no anan; saa bere no paa na nsakrae no bɛda adi kɛse. (Yeremia 31:31-33; Kolosefoɔ 2:14; Hebrifoɔ 8:7-13) Sɛ Onyankopɔn hwie honhom kronkron gu ne nkurɔfo so Pentekoste afe 33 a, obiara bɛhu sɛ Yesu asuafo no na wɔwɔ gyinabea pa wɔ Onyankopɔn anim na ɛnyɛ Farisifo ne nyamesom mpanimfoɔ a aka no.

Kojo Oppong Nkrumah
- Kyerɛ Twi kasa a atwerɛsɛm yi ɛwɔ mu. Kasa ahorow a wobɛtumi akyerɛ ɛne: Akuapem, Asante, Fante.
Kojo Oppong Nkrumah ( Nawoda ne Oforisuo da etɔ so 5, afe 1982) yɛ Ghanani amanyɔni ne mmaranimfoɔ . ɔyɛ mmarahyɛ beguani a ogyina hɔ ma Ofoase-Ayirebi abatoɔ mpesua so
Ne mmɔfrase ho nsɛm[sesa]
Wɔ woo Kojo oppong Nkrumah wɔ koforidua a ɛwɔ apuei fam wɔ Ghana. Nawofo ne Kwame Oppong Nkrumah ne Felicia Oppong Nkrumah. Na ne maame yɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo na na ne papa nso kyerɛ ade nanso
... 
Ghana mu de abodin krataa maa Kojo se Ghana mmaranimfo
Adwuma ho nsɛm[sesa]
Kojo hyɛɛ n’adwumayɛ ase wɔ adwumakuo bi a ne din de British American Tobaco wɔ afe 2006 mu. Na saa adwumakuo yɛ tawa ho nnwuma. Ofii hɔ kɔɔ Joy Fm, kɔyɛɛ adwuma sɛ nsɛm kyerɔ wfo ma wɔ faa no sɛ otitenani ma wɔn anɔpa dwumadie, bere a nea na odi saa dwumdie a ne din de Komla Dumor afiri hɔ no. wɔ afe 2014 mu no, Kojo de ne dwumadie no too hɔ na obue ɔnoa nadwumakuo a wɔ frɔ no West Brown Stone Capital.
Wɔ afe 2016 mu no
...
so wɔ Ghana . Odii nkunim wɔ 2016 abatoɔ no mu . Sesei, ɔresom sɛ ɔsoafo a ɔhwɛ amaniebɔ so wo Ghana.ɔyɛ kasamafo ma aban no wɔ sikasem ho amaneɛbɔ ho. ɔka ekuo bi a ɛwɔ mmarahyɛ begua mu a wɔhwɛ sikasem ntotoe ho.
Abrabɔ[sesa]
Kojo yere din de Akua na ɔne no wɔ mma mienu. Wɔn din de Kwaku ne Afua

Wɔde Apam Adaka No Ba Asɔredan Mu
1 Afei, Salomo frɛɛ Israel mmusuakuw ne mmusua biara mu ntuanofo nyinaa, sɛ wonhyia wɔ Yerusalem. Na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔfa Awurade Apam Adaka no fi baabi a ɛwɔ wɔ Dawid kurow a wɔfrɛ no Sion no mu, de ba baabi foforo wɔ Asɔredan mu hɔ.
2 Wɔn nyinaa behyiaa wɔ ɔhene anim wɔ afirihyia afahyɛ a wɔfrɛ no Guankɔbea Afahyɛ no ase wɔ ɔsram Bul (bɛyɛ Ahinime) mu.
3 Bere a ntuanofo no duu Israel no, asɔfo no maa adaka no so.
4 Afei, asɔfo no ne Lewifo maa Awurade Adaka no ne Nta
... 
o nkyɛn, na wɔbɔ wo din frɛ wo, na wɔbɔ wo mpae wɔ Asɔredan mu ha a,
34 ɛno de, tie fi ɔsoro, na fa wɔn bɔne kyɛ wɔn, na ma wɔnsan nkɔ asase a wode maa wɔn agyanom no so.
35 “Sɛ ɔsoro mu to, na osu ntɔ, efisɛ wo nkurɔfo ayɛ bɔne atia wo, na afei, wɔbɔ mpae wɔ Asɔredan mu ha, bɔ wo din, ka wɔn bɔne, na wɔdan fi wɔn bɔne ho, efisɛ woatwe wɔn aso a,
36 ɛno de, tie fi ɔsoro, na fa wʼasomfo, wo nkurɔfo Israelfo, bɔne kyɛ wɔn. Kyerɛ wɔn nea eye, na ma osu ntɔ ngu wʼasase a wode ama wo nkurɔfo sɛ wɔn a
...
bree.
65 Na Salomo ne Israel nyinaa bɔɔ mu, dii Guankɔbea Afahyɛ wɔ Awurade, wɔn Nyankopɔn, anim. Nnipadɔm no fi Lebo Hamat wɔ atifi fam kosi Misraim asuwa wɔ anafo fam, na wɔbae. Afahyɛ yi kɔɔ so ara nnafua dunan. Emu nnanson na wɔde daa afɔremuka no adi, na wɔde mu nnanson nso dii Guankɔbea Afahyɛ no.
66 Afahyɛ no twaa mu no, Salomo maa ɔmanfo no kɔɔ wɔn kurom. Wɔrekɔ no nyinaa na wɔrehyira ɔhene no. Na wɔn nyinaa nyaa ahosɛpɛw ne ahotɔ, efisɛ Awurade ne ne somfo Dawid ne Israelfo adi no yiye.

1Saa krataa yi fi Yesu Kristo somafo Petro nkyɛn,
Ɔde kɔma Onyankopɔn nnipa a wayi wɔn a wɔabɔ ahwete sɛ ahɔho kɔ Ponto, Galatia, Kapadokia, Asia ne Bitinia amantam mu no. 2Wɔnam Agya Onyankopɔn botae so na woyii mo na wɔnam ne Honhom so tew mo ho sɛ munni Yesu Kristo akyi na ɛnam so ama ne mogya no atew mo ho:
Adom ne asomdwoe a ɛdɔɔso nka mo.
Anidaso
3Momma yɛnna Onyankopɔn a ɔyɛ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo Agya no ase. Esiane nʼahummɔbɔ dodow nti, ɔnam nyan a onyan Yesu Kristo fii owu mu no so ma
... 
yiri no wɔdaa no adi no. 21Ɛnam ne so na mugyee Onyankopɔn a onyan no fii awufo mu na ɔmaa no anuonyam no dii. Ɛnam so ama mo gyidi ne mo anidaso ase atim wɔ Onyankopɔn mu no.
22Afei a moayɛ osetie ama nokware no nti, mo ho atew na mododɔ mo nuanom agyidifo nokware mu yi, mumfi mo koma nyinaa mu nnodɔ mo ho mo ho. 23Efisɛ wɔawo mo foforo; emfi aba a ɛporɔw mu, na mmom efi Onyankopɔn asɛm a ɛmporɔw no mu. 24Kyerɛwsɛm no ka se,
“Nnipa nyinaa te sɛ sare;
na wɔn anuonyam te sɛ nhwiren.
Sare no wu ma
...
זאת נודעה ברבים רק בימים אחרונים אלה. 21על-ידי המשיח אתם מאמינים באלוהים אשר הקימו מן המתים והעניק לו כבוד רב, כך שאמונתכם ותקוותכם מבוססות באלוהים.
22היות שטוהרתם מאנוכיות ומשנאה כשהאמנתם במשיח ובבשורתו, אהבו איש את רעהו אהבה כנה ועזה. 23שהרי עתה נולדתם מחדש, לא מזרע שנשחת אלא מזרע בלתי נשחת, באמצעות דבר ה' החי וקיים. 24אכן, חיינו הנוכחיים יגיעו לקיצם; הם יבלו כעשב שמתייבש ומצהיב. כל דבר שהתפארנו בו יבול כפרח, 25אולם דבר ה' יעמוד לעולם!1.25 א 24-25 ראה ישעיהו מ 6-8 והבשורה אשר שמעתם היא דבר ה'.

ME ƐBƐLA DƐBA
Bɛwole me wɔ Puerto Limón, sua bie mɔɔ meli agyinlaleɛ wɔ ɛkɛ wɔ Costa Rica aduduleɛ ɛnwea zo la. Me awovolɛ wole ngakula mɔtwɛ, ɛnee metɔ zo nsuu. Menyianle ɛvolɛ mɔtwɛ la yɛɛ me papa wule a. Ɔti me mame angomekye a tetele yɛ a.
Ɛnee me nye die baseball nwo kpalɛ. Mele kakula la ɛnee me nye die nwɔhoalilɛ nwo. Ɔka ekyii na meanyia ɛvolɛ 20 la, menvale me nwo membɔle ba
... 
wɔ nyianu ne abo la hanle me maanle me nee Alasevolɛ ne mɔ bɔle Baebolo ɛzukoalɛ bo na mengɔle bɛ debiezukoalɛ ne mɔ.
Me nye liele Baebolo ngilehilelɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ menzukoale la anwo. Kɛ neazo la, Gyisɛse hanle kɛ wɔ awieleɛ mekɛ ne anu, ye ɛdoavolɛma babɔ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo edwɛkpa ne nolo wɔ ewiade amuala. (Mateyu 24:14) Eza menzukoale kɛ nɔhalɛ Kilisienema ɛnlie ezukoa wɔ edwɛkɛhanlɛ gyima ne anwo. Gyisɛse hanle kɛ: “Bɛnyianle ye mgbane, bɛva bɛmaa mgbane.”—Mateyu 10:8.
Wɔ me Baeb
...
kɛ ɛnɛ melɛ agɔnwolɛma kpalɛ, me ɛbɛlabɔlɛ ɛnyia ngyinlazo yɛɛ menyia nɔhalɛ anyelielɛ.
Me nye tɛdie baseball nwo, noko adwenle mɔɔ melɛ wɔ nwo la le ngakyile. Ɛnee mebɔ medie duma nee ezukoa, ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ ɛndɛnla ɛkɛ ne dahuu. Noko, me nee Nyamenle nee me mediema avinli agɔnwolɛvalɛ ne badɛnla ɛkɛ dahuu. Baebolo ne ka kɛ: “ewiade nee ye atiakunluwɔzo ɛlɛpɛ nu, noko awie mɔɔ yɛ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛdeɛ la de aze dahuu.” (1 Dwɔn 2:17) Ɛnɛ, mekulo Gyihova Nyamenle nee ye menli ne metɛla debie biala!

Nnwom 149Nkwa Asem (NA-TWI)
Ayeyi dwom
149 Kamfo Awurade. To dwom foforo ma Awurade. Kamfo no wɔ ne gyidifo bagua mu.
2 Ma w’ani nnye, Israel, wo boafo nti. Momma mo ani nnye, Sionfo, esiane mo hene nti! 3 Momfa asaw nkamfo ne din. Mommɔ nkyene ne nsanku nkamfo ne din.
4 Awurade ani gye ne nkurɔfo ho. Ɔma ɔhobrɛaseni di nkonim de hyɛ no anuonyam. 5 Momma Onyankopɔn ani nnye wɔ wɔn nkonimdi mu na wɔnto ahosɛpɛw nnwom anadwo mu nyinaa.
6 Wɔrekamfo Onyankopɔn no, wɔnteɛm dennen bere a wokita wɔn nkrante nnamnnam no a, 7 wɔde bedi aman so na wɔatwe nnipa aso 8 na wɔakyekyere ahene wɔ nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu, wɔn mpanyimfo daban nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu, 9 na wɔatwe aman aso sɛnea Onyankopɔn ahyɛ no. Eyi ne Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo nkonimdi.
Kamfo Awurade.

Ahyɛmu Fofor no mu, Ewuradze no nua (Gal. 1:19) na Joses, Simon, Judas, na nkyerɛbaa binom so (Matt. 13:55–56; Mark 6:3; Jude 1:1). Ne dzin kor so nye James Pɛrpɛrdzinyi na ne dzibew wɔ Jerusalem Asɔr no mu so yie (Ndwu. 12:17; 15:13; 1 Cor. 15:7; Gal. 2:9–12). Ɔyɛ dɛ ɔno na ɔkyerɛɛw James ne krataa no.
Ahyɛmu Fofor no mu nwoma. Ahyɛse no nna ɔyɛ krataa a ɔkyerɛwee dze kɛmaa Israel ebusuakuw duebien a wɔapetse no na ɔyɛ dɛ ɔkyerɛwee fii Jerusalem. Krataa no yɛ nsɛm binom a ɔda edzi pefee a ɔfa nyamesɛm a wɔdze bɔ bra, afotu a ohia papaapa wɔ tsir 1 mu dɛ sɛ obi hia nyansa a, ombisa Nyame hɔ mboa (James 1:5–6; JS—Aba 1:9–20). Tsir 2 kã gyedzi na ndwuma ho nsɛm. Etsir 3–4 kã dɛ ohia dɛ yɛhwɛ hɛn tɛkyerɛma yie na otu Ahotseweefo no fo dɛ mma wɔnnkã kasa bɔn nnkyerɛ hɔnho nkorkor. Tsir 5 hyɛ Ahotseweefo nkuran dɛ wonya abotar na sɛ obi yar so a wɔmfrɛ elderfo no ma wombehyira no; ɔkyerɛkyerɛ so ɔfa nhyira a inya sɛ eboa ma wɔsakyer binom a.

Bere a Yesu saa ɔbarima bi yareɛ no, Yudafo bi bɔɔ no sobo sɛ wabu Homeda so. Yesu buaa sɛ: “M’Agya ayɛ adwuma abɛsi sɛsɛɛ, na me nso mekɔ so yɛ adwuma.”—Yohane 5:17.
Nea Yesu yɛe no ntia Onyankopɔn mmara a ɛfa Homeda ho no. Asɛnka adwuma a ɔyɛe ne yareɛ a ɔsae nyinaa yɛ nnwuma pa a ɔyɛ de suasuaa Onyankopɔn. Enti da biara na Yesu yɛ adepa. Nanso asɛm a ɔsan ka kyerɛɛ n’atamfo no, ɛno koraa na ɛberee wɔn kuro, enti afei deɛ na wɔrepɛ no akum no. Dɛn nko ara na ɔkae?
Homeda a Yesu saa nkurɔfo yar
... 
om wafiri owuo mu aba nkwa mu.”—Yohane 5:24.
Biribiara nni hɔ a ɛkyerɛ sɛ ɛbɛsi saa bere no, na Yesu anyane obi, nanso ɔka kyerɛɛ n’atamfo no sɛ bere bi reba a ɔbɛnyane awufo. Ɔkaa sɛ: “Dɔn no reba a wɔn a wɔwɔ nkae ada mu nyinaa bɛte ne nne na wɔafiri adi.”—Yohane 5:28, 29.
Ɛwom, na Yesu nyɛ nipa ketewa, nanso ɔmaa mu daa hɔ sɛ ɔhyɛ Onyankopɔn ase. Ɔkaa sɛ: “Mentumi mmɔ me tirim nyɛ hwee; . . . menhwehwɛ deɛ me ara mepɛ, na mmom deɛ ɔsomaa me no apɛdeɛ.” (Yohane 5:30) Ne nyinaa mu no, Yesu maa 
...
somaa me no ara adi me ho adanseɛ.” (Yohane 5:36, 37) Ɛho nhwɛso ne bere a wɔbɔɔ Yesu asu no. Saa bere no, Onyankopɔn dii Yesu ho adanse.—Mateo 3:17.
Asɛm no ara ne sɛ, wɔn a wɔbɔɔ Yesu sobo no, na wɔnni nnyinaso biara. Ná wɔkyerɛ sɛ wɔhwehwɛ Kyerɛwnsɛm no mu, nanso Kyerɛwnsɛm koro no ara na ɛdii Yesu ho adanse. Yesu wiee n’asɛm no sɛ: “Sɛ mogye Mose di a, anka mobɛgye me adi, ɛfiri sɛ ɔtwerɛɛ me ho asɛm. Na sɛ monnye nsɛm a ɔtwerɛeɛ no nni a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na mobɛgye me nsɛm adie?”—Yohane 5:46, 47.

Nea Bible ka
Onipa biara wɔ din. Enti wonnye nni sɛ Onyankopɔn nso bɛwɔ din? Sɛ nnipa mmienu bɛtumi afa adamfoɔ a, adeɛ baako a ɛho hia paa ne sɛ wɔn mu biara bɛhu ne yɔnko din na ɔde afrɛ no. Onyankopɔn nso ɛ? Sɛ yɛbɛtumi afa no adamfoɔ a, wonnye nni sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yɛdi kan hu ne din?
Onyankopɔn aka wɔ Bible mu sɛ: “Mene Yehowa; me din ne no.” (Yesaia 42:8) Onyankopɔn wɔ abodin pii te sɛ, “Adeɛ nyinaa so Tumfoɔ Nyankopɔn,” “Awurade Tumfoɔ,” ne “Ɔbɔadeɛ.” Nanso waka akyerɛ n’asomfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa ne din ankasa mfrɛ no. Ɛno kyerɛ sɛ ɔdi wɔn ni.—Genesis 17:1; Asomafoɔ Nnwuma 4:24; 1 Petro 4:19.
Sɛ wohwɛ Bible dodoɔ no ara mu a, wobɛhu Onyankopɔn din wɔ Exodus 6:3. Ɛhɔ kenkan sɛ: “Meyii me ho adi kyerɛɛ Abraham, Isak, ne Yakob sɛ adeɛ nyinaa so Tumfoɔ Nyankopɔn, nanso me din Yehowa no deɛ, mamma wɔamfa anhu me.”
Bɛboro mfie ɔha ni a wɔhyɛɛ ase twerɛɛ Onyankopɔn din “Yehowa” wɔ Twi mu. Nhomanimfoɔ binom ka sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yɛtwerɛ Onyankopɔn din no “Yahwe.” Nanso sɛ nnipa pii no ara retwerɛ Onyankopɔn din no a, wɔtwerɛ no “Yehowa.” Ɛnyɛ Twi na wɔde twerɛɛ Bible no fã a wɔfrɛ no ‘Apam Dada’ no, na mmom Hebri. Hebri yɛ kasa a wɔkenkan fi nifa de kɔ benkum. Wɔde anom ntwerɛdeɛ nnan a ɛne יהוה na ɛgyina hɔ ma Onyankopɔn din wɔ Hebri mu. Wotwerɛ no sɛnea yɛtwerɛ adeɛ nnɛ no a, ɛyɛ YHWH. Wɔfrɛ saa anom ntwerɛdeɛ nnan yi Tetragrammaton.

Yona Kɔ Ninewe
1Afei, Awurade asɛm baa Yona nkyɛn ne mprenu so se, 2“Kɔ Ninewe kuropɔn no mu, na kɔpae mu ka asɛm a mede rema wo yi.”
3Yona yɛɛ osetie maa Awurade asɛm no, na ɔkɔɔ Ninewe. Na Ninewe yɛ kuropɔn titiriw a wɔde nnansa na etwa mu nyinaa. 4Da a edi kan no, Yona hyɛn kuropɔn no mu, na ofii ase pae mu kae se, “Aka adaduanan na wɔadan Ninewe abutuw.” 5Ninewefo gyee Nyankopɔn dii. Wɔhyɛɛ sɛ wɔn nyinaa bedi mmuada, efi ɔkɛse so kosi aketewa so, na wɔafurafura atweaatam.
6Bere a Ninewehene tee asɛm no, ɔsɔre fii nʼahengua so, ɔworɔw nʼahentade, ofuraa atweaatam, na ɔtenaa mfutuma mu. 7Afei, ɔma wɔbɔɔ dawuru wɔ Ninewe se,
“Mmara a wofi ɔhene ne nʼatitiriw hɔ ni:
“Obiara, sɛ ɔyɛ onipa anaa aboa, anantwikuw anaa nguankuw, mmfa hwee nka nʼano; onnnidi anaa ɔnnom. 8Na mmom nnipa ne mmoa mfa atweaatam nkata wɔn ho. Obiara mfa anibere nsu mfrɛ Onyankopɔn. Womfi wɔn akwammɔne so, na wonnyae basabasayɛ. 9Hena na onim? Ebia, Onyankopɔn behu yɛn mmɔbɔ, na watwe nʼabufuwhyew no a ɔnam so rebɛsɛe yɛn no asan.” 10Na Onyankopɔn huu sɛnea wɔyɛɛ ne sɛnea wɔsan fii wɔn akwammɔne ho no, ohuu wɔn mmɔbɔ, na wansɛe wɔn sɛnea ɔkae no.

Nneɛma a yɛde sua Bible wɔ yɛn nhomakorabea hɔ; wubetumi de asua ade a wuntua hwee. Ebetumi aboa wo ama woasua Bible yiye na ama woate Onyankopɔn Asɛm no ase paa. Nneɛma pii wɔ yɛn Bible a ɛwɔ Intanɛt so no mu; wubetumi de asua ade a wuntua hwee. Hwɛ yɛn Bible adesua ho nhyehyɛe a ebetumi aboa wo ama w’ankasa woatumi asua Bible no. Yɛwɔ nneɛma a yɛde sua ade a wubetumi de asua Bible ate ase a wuntua hwee. Ebi yɛ Bible ho video, nhoma a ɛka Bible ho nsɛm pii, Bible map ahorow, nsɛmfua a ɛwɔ Bible mu ne ne nkyerɛase, ne nneɛma foforo a yɛde sua Bible.
Video Ahorow a Yɛde Yɛ Bible Adesua
Video ntiantiaa yi bɛma woanya Bible nsɛmmisa a ɛho hia paa ho mmuae. Ebi ne: Adɛn nti na Onyankopɔn bɔɔ asaase? Tebea bɛn na awufo wom? ne Adɛn nti na Onyankopɔn ma yehu amane?
Nhoma Ne Nneɛma Foforo a Yɛde Sua Bible
Wohwɛ ‘Hwɛ Asase Pa No’ nhoma no mu a, wubehu map ahorow pii a wɔde kɔla ayɛ ne nsɛm a wɔahyehyɛ a ɛma yehu mmeae bi a Bible ka ho asɛm; titiriw sɛnea na Bɔhyɛ Asaase no te wɔ mmere ahorow mu.
Kyerɛwnsɛm No Mu a Wobɛhwehwɛ Daa nhoma no te sɛ nhoma a asɔre ahorow bi de yɛ wɔn anɔpasɔre; wohwɛ mu a wubehu sɛ ɛda biara wɔ Bible mu asɛm tiawa bi ne ɛho nkyerɛkyerɛmu a wɔde ama.
Ma Obi Mmra Wo Nkyɛn Ne Wo Mmesua Bible
Yehowa Adansefo ne nkurɔfo bɔ Bible mu nkɔmmɔ a wonnye sika. Wubetumi de Bible biara a wopɛ asua ade no. Wopɛ a, wubetumi afrɛ w’abusuafo nyinaa ne wo nnamfo abesua bi.

Jacqueline Marie Zaba Nikiéma (wɔwoo no Fankwa 19, 1957 wɔ Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso),[1] ɔyɛ edwuma dɛ Panyin a ogyina ma ne man wɔ amanɔnye , ɔyɛ Ananmusifo a ofi Burkina Faso dze ma Organisation of African, Caribbean na Pacific States (ACP).[2] Nna ɔyɛ nyimpa soronko a ogyina ma Panyin a odzi ECOWAS Commission enyim wɔ Guinea.[1]
Dɛ ɔyɛ Anamusifo a nye ndwuma da nsiw na Panyin a w'ama n'aban ama nye tumi dɛɛ ongyina ma nye ɔman wɔ amanɔnye ma Burkina Faso dze ma Kingdom of Belgium na daa Ananmusifo dze ma European Union, ɔdze nye nsa hyɛɛ nkrataa ase wɔ International Energy Charter wɔ bosoom Ebɔw 16, afe 2017 mu.[3]
Onyaa nye abodzin nkrataa Masters Degree wɔ Economic na Social Administration osua adze yie wɔ Public Service Management. Ɔsanso nyaa Bachelors Degree wɔ dɛm adzesua ne ho frii University of Lyon II, dɛmara so wɔ University of Paris I, Sorbonne, France. W'asanso aben ne ho wɔ Post-Graduate Degree (DESS) wɔ Political Science na ɔwɔ ɔpɛ dze ma Development and Cooperation.

• ^ "BURKINA FASO SIGNS THE INTERNATIONAL ENERGY CHARTER". Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Turkmenistan. Retrieved 6 May 2020.

Cameroon, wɔ aban kwan so sɛ Republic of Cameroon, yɛ ɔman bi a ɛwɔ Afrika atɔe fam mfinimfini.[1] Ɛne Nigeria wɔ ahye wɔ atɔe ne atifi fam, Chad wɔ atifi apuei, Central African Republic wɔ apuei fam, ne Equatorial Guinea, Gabon ne Republic of the Congo wɔ anafo fam. Ne mpoano da Bight of Biafra, Gulf of Guinea ne Atlantic Po no fã bi so. Esiane sɛ ɛwɔ gyinabea pa wɔ Afrika Atɔe Fam ne Afrika Mfinimfini kwan no ntam nti, wɔakyekyɛ mu sɛ ɛwɔ nsraban abien no nyinaa mu. Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ emu nnipa ɔpepem 27 ka kurom kasa 250 ne Borɔfo anaa Franse anaa n’abien nyinaa.[2]

Wɔ Daniel nhoma no mu no, Mikael ne abɔfo bɔne bi reko; wɔ Yuda nhoma no mu no, ɔne Satan redi akameakame; wɔ Adiyisɛm mu no, ɔne Ɔbonsam ne n’adaemone reko. Ɔbɔfo Panyin. Onyankopɔn Asɛm frɛ Mikael “ɔbɔfo panyin.” (Yuda 9) Hyɛ no nsow sɛ wɔfrɛ Mikael ɔbɔfo panyin. Eyi kyerɛ sɛ ɔbɔfo biako pɛ na ɔde saa. Nokwarem no, asɛm “ɔbɔfo panyin” no pue Bible mu wɔ biako kabea mu nkutoo, empue wɔ dodow kabea mu da. Afei nso, wɔfrɛ Yesu ɔbɔfo panyin. Wɔka Awurade Yesu Kristo a wɔanyan no no ho asɛm wɔ 1 Tesalonikafo 4:16 sɛ: “Awurade ankasa de nteɛm a emu yɛ den, ɔbɔfo panyin nne . . . besian afi soro.” Ent
...
iyisɛm san ka Yesu ho asɛm sɛ ɔyɛ asafodɔm anokwafo bi Sahene. (Adiyisɛm 19:14-16) Na ɔsomafo Paulo ka “Awurade Yesu” ne “n’abɔfo a wɔwɔ tumi” ho asɛm pefee. (2 Tesalonikafo 1:7) Enti Bible ka Mikael ne “n’abɔfo” ne Yesu ne “n’abɔfo” nyinaa ho asɛm. (Mateo 13:41; 16:27; 24:31; 1 Petro 3:22) Esiane sɛ Onyankopɔn Asɛm nka wɔ baabiara sɛ asafodɔm akuw abien na ɛwɔ soro a Mikael yɛ biako so panyin na Yesu nso yɛ biako so panyin nti, ɛfata sɛ yɛbɛka sɛ edin a wɔde frɛ Yesu Kristo wɔ soro ne Mikael. *

Cantu a tenòre (Sardinian kasa mu: su tenòre, su cuncòrdu, su cuntràttu, su cussèrtu, s’agorropamèntu, su cantu a pròa; Italia kasa mu: canto a tenore) yɛ ɔkwan a wɔfa do tow ndwom a wɔdze ndze ahorow pii to a ɔyɛ Sardinia supɔw no su (Italy ma ɔtɔ do ebien supɔw a ɔso sen obiara), tsitsir Barbagia mantɔw no, ɔwɔ mu dɛ Sardinia amantɔw nkakraba afofor bi kutsa atsetsesɛm a ɔtse dɛm ho nhwɛdo dze.

s 'bass'
Bassu no tow ndwom kor no ara a ‘oche no to no, na ɔnye bassu no etsifi nkyem enum mu kor. 'Oche ne mesu 'oche dze ndze a wɔdze to ndwom daa to ndwom, ber a contra na bassu no dze kwan bi a ɔka anom no tow ndwom. ‘Oche no tow anwensɛm mu nkyerɛwee bi wɔ Sardinian kasa mu, a obotum ayɛ ayɛsɛm, abakɔsɛm, asersɛm, amorous anaa mpo protest genre. Ndwontofo ndwom no yɛ enyigye nkyerɛwdze a ɔyɛ nkwaseasɛm (sɛ nhwɛdo no, Bim-Bam-Boo).

Yɛahu sɛ atwerɛfoɔ ne Farisifo no annye antom sɛ Onyankopɔn tumi na Yesu de tuu ahonhommɔne. Ɛno a wɔyɛe no kyerɛ sɛ na wɔreyɛ akasa atia honhom kronkron. Enti hwan afa na na wɔbɛgyina? Onyankopɔn anaa Satan? Yesu kaa sɛ: “Sɛ moma dua no yɛ dua pa a, n’aba nso bɛyɛ aba pa, nanso moma dua no porɔ a, n’aba nso bɛporɔ; ɛfiri sɛ dua biara aba na wɔde hunu dua korɔ.”—Mateo 12:33.
Yɛbɛtumi aka sɛ ahonhommɔne a Yesu tui no yɛ aba pa, enti sɛ obi ka sɛ Yesu nyaa saa tumi no fii Satan hɔ a, nyansa biara 
... 
erɛnne biara gye odiyifoɔ Yona sɛnkyerɛnne no.”—Mateo 12:38, 39.
Yesu kyerɛɛ asɛm no mu maa emu daa hɔ sɛ: “Sɛdeɛ Yona dii apataa kɛseɛ no yam nnansa, awia ne anadwo no, saa ara na onipa Ba no bɛdi asase yam nnansa, awia ne anadwo.” Apataa kɛse bi menee Yona, nanso ɔsan bae; ɛyɛɛ sɛ nea wasɔre afiri awufo mu no. Yesu asɛm no kyerɛ sɛ ɔno nso bɛwu nanso nnansa akyi no ɔbɛsɔre. Yesu wu sɔree ampa, nanso Yudafo mpanimfoɔ no annye “Yona sɛnkyerɛnne no” antom; wɔanyɛ wɔn adwene koraa sɛ wɔbɛsakra wɔn
...
wɔhu wo.” Afei Yesu kyerɛɛ sɛnea ɔbɛn n’asuafo no; ɔma wɔhuu sɛ wɔte sɛ ne nuanom mmarima ne mmaa, ne ne maame. Ɔtenee ne nsa kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no so kaa sɛ: “Me maame ne me nua mmarima ne yeinom a wɔte Onyankopɔn asɛm na wɔyɛ no.” (Luka 8:20, 21) Nea ɔkae yi kyerɛ sɛ ɛwom sɛ na n’abusuafo ho hia no deɛ, nanso n’asuafo no koraa na na wɔn ho hia no kɛse. Wei ma yɛhu sɛ nneɛma pa a yɛreyɛ nti sɛ nkurɔfo mpɛ yɛn asɛm na wɔkasa tia yɛn mpo a, yɛnim sɛ yɛn nuanom Kristofo adamfofa no ma yɛn akomatɔyam!

Meto wo ayeyi dwom wɔ anyame no anim. 2 M’ani kyerɛ wo fi kronkron no, kotow, kamfo wo din esiane wo dɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ daa no ne wo nokware nti, efisɛ woada no adi sɛ, wo din ne w’ahyɛde yɛ tumi. 3 Bere a mefrɛɛ wo no, wubuaa me; wonam w’ahoɔden so hyɛɛ me den. 4 Ahene a wɔwɔ wiase nyinaa bɛkamfo wo, Awurade efisɛ, wɔate wo bɔhyɛ no. 5 Wɔbɛto nea woayɛ ne w’anuonyam kɛse no ho dwom. 6 Ɛwom sɛ wokorɔn de, nanso wohwɛ wɔn a wɔwɔ fam pɛɛ no na ahantanfo rentumi mfa wɔn ho nhintaw wo. 7 Sɛ ɔhaw twa me ho hyia a, wugye me. Woko tia m’atamfo a wɔn bo afuw no, na wonam wo tumi so gye me. 8 Ɛbɔ biara a woahyɛ no, wubedi so; Awurade, wo dɔ wɔ hɔ daa.Wie adwuma a wafi ase no.

WOKƆ Cambodia a, wubehu nkuraa a ɛwowɔ nsuo so, edwa a nnipa rebu fa so wom, moto a wɔde retwe nneɛma te sɛ nkokɔ ne frigye.
Cambodiafo anim te, wɔpɛ nnipa na obiara yɔnko yɛ ne busuani. Sɛ Cambodiani nnim obi koraa na ohyia no abɔnten mpo a, ɔde sista, brɔda, ante, wɔfa, nana ne nea ɛkeka ho bɛka ne din ho; ɔremmɔ no dinweɛ da!
Cambodiafo pɛ ɛmo paa. Wɔnoa nnuane a, wɔyɛ no ahorow ahorow mmiɛnsa anaa nnan; wɔtaa yɛ nkwan ka ho. Wɔnkɔ nnya nsuomnam koraa. Wotumi de nnuane a ɛyɛ fremfrem, deɛ ɛka, anaa deɛ nkyene wom nyinaa si pon so.
Bɛyɛ mfe mpem mmienu a atwam no, sɛ India adwadifoɔ ne nnipa a nyamesom nti wotutu akwan rekɔ China a, na wɔfa Cambodia mpoano. Na wɔde sirikyi ne nnade kɔsesa nneɛma bi te sɛ mako, galik, ɛhyɛ nnua, asonse ne sika kɔkɔɔ. Eduu baabi no, na Cambodiafo asuasua Indiafo ne Chinafo amammerɛ, enti na Hindusom ne Buddhasom agye adwa wɔ hɔ. Ɛnnɛ Cambodiafo dodow no ara yɛ Buddhafo.
Yehowa Adansefo ka Bible mu asɛm kyerɛ Cambodiafo; ɛma wonya anidaso. Wɔde Dɛn na Bible Kyerɛkyerɛ Ankasa? nhoma no aboa nnipa pii. Wɔakyerɛ ase kɔ kasa bɛboro 250 mu; Cambodia kasa ka ho.
Dɛn na Bible Kyerɛkyerɛ Ankasa? nhoma no. Yehowa Adansefo na wɔyɛe; ɛwɔ Cambodia kasa mu (ɛno ni).

Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn mu nyiseen No, ɔbaabun Mary woo No,
Ohun amandze wɔ Pontius Pilate nsa, wɔbɔɔ No mbeamudua mu,
Owui, wosiee No, Osianee kɔr samanadze; Da a otsia ebiasa no,
ɔsoɛree fii ewufo mu, ɔfowee kɔr sor, Na ɔ Nyankopɔn Egya
Tumfo No abanyimfa; hɔ na ofi beba ebobu enyikamfo nye ewufo atsɛn.
Megye Sunsum krɔnkrɔn midzi; Asɔr krɔnkrɔn a ɔwɔ mbea nyina;
Ahotseweefo nkitahodzi, Bɔnfakyɛ, Nyimpadua no wunyan;
Nye nkwaa a onnyi ewiei. Amen.

Onyankopɔn nhyehyɛe aba mu
10 Afei mihuu ɔbɔfo tumfoɔ bi a ofi soro resian ba fam. Na ɔhyɛ omununkum mu a nyankontɔn bɔ ne ti. Na n’anim te sɛ owia, na ne nan te sɛ ogya fadum. 2 Na nhoma ketewaa bi kita no a wabue mu. Ɔde ne nan nifa sii po so na benkum no si asase so. 3 Ɔteɛɛm maa ne nne woroo so sɛ gyata. Ɔfrɛe no, aprannaa ason no woroo so gyee so.
4 Wɔkasae pɛ, na mepɛ sɛ mekyerɛw. Nanso metee nne bi fii soro a ɛkae se, “Ma nsɛm a aprannaa ason no kae no nka wo tirim. Nkyerɛw!”
5 Ɛhɔ ara, ɔbɔfo a mihui sɛ ogyina hɔ a ne nan baako si po so na baako si asase so no maa ne nsa nifa so kɔɔ soro, 6 na ɔde Onyankopɔn a ɔte hɔ daa daa a ɔbɔɔ soro ne asase ne po ne nea ɛwɔ mu nyinaa no din kaa ntam. Ɔbɔfo no kae se, “Beresɛe biara nni hɔ. 7 Na sɛ ɔbɔfo a ɔto so ason no hyɛn ne torobɛnto no a, ansa na Onyankopɔn bewie n’ahintasɛm mu nhyehyɛe no, sɛnea ɔka kyerɛɛ n’asomfo a wɔyɛ adiyifo no.”
8 Afei nne a metee sɛ efi soro no kasa kyerɛɛ me bio se, “Kɔ na kogye nhoma a wabue mu a ekita ɔbɔfo a ogyina po ne asase so no.”
9 Mekɔɔ ɔbɔfo no nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no se ɔmfa nhoma ketewaa no mma me. Ɔka kyerɛɛ me se, “Gye na kɔwe. Ɛbɛkeka wɔ wo yam, nanso w’anom de, ɛbɛyɛ dɛ te sɛ ɛwo.”
10 Migyee nhoma ketewa no fii ne nsam wee na ɛyɛɛ dɛ te sɛ wo wɔ m’anom. Nanso memenee no akyi, ɛkekae wɔ me yam.
11 Afei wɔka kyerɛɛ me se, “Ɛsɛ sɛ woka nkurɔfo ne aman ne ɔkasa ne ahemfo bebree ho adiyisɛm bio.”

Nzulezo yɛ akuraa bi a ɛbɛn Beyin akuraa, kilomita 90 wɔ Takoradi atɔeɛ fam, wɔ Jomoro Mantam jomoro Ghana Atɔeɛ Mantam mu.[1] Nnipa bɛboro 500 na wɔte mpɔtam hɔ.[1]
Nzulezo hwɛ Ɔtare Tadane, na ne nyinaa yɛ nnua ne asɛnka agua. Wɔ afe 2000 mu no, wɔyii no sɛ UNESCO Wiase Agyapadeɛ, na ɛyɛ beaeɛ titire a nsrahwɛfoɔ kɔ hɔ.[1] Beae no reyɛ nsrahwɛfo fibea kɛse, na nsrahwɛfo ba bɛhwɛ akuraa no ase ne ɛhɔnom nsa bi a wɔyɛ wɔ akuraa no ase nso.[2]
Edin "Nzulezo" wɔ Nzema kasa mu kyerɛ "nsu ani", na ɛ
... 
bere a mpataayi di dwuma a ɛto so abien. Ɔtare no yɛ nea ɛhɔfo hu sɛ ɛbɔ ho ban fi asiane ahorow bi ho (e.g. ogya).[1] Akuraa no ase no nyaa afie no bi a nsuyiri bi a ɛtɔe wɔ afe 2009 mu no fa bi guu nsu ase ampa.[5]
Akuraa no ase wɔ ayarehwɛfo ne akwahosan ho adwumayɛfo kakraa bi.[2]
Mfitiaseɛ sukuu wɔ hɔ na sɛ mfitiaseɛ sukuu wie a, ɛsɛ sɛ asuafoɔ firi akuraa no ase kɔ ntoasoɔ sukuu ne sukuupɔn.[6] Nanso, ɛde besi afe 2019 no, na akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ho ayɛ na ama mpɔtam hɔfoɔ.[2]
Wɔde saa beae yi k
...
nkoro pɛ dapɛn biara).[1] Ɔkorow nkutoo na wobetumi de akɔ akuraa no ase; ɔkwan a ɛfa kwae a osu tɔ na owia bɔ kɛse wom no gye bɛyɛ dɔnhwerew biako kosi kilomita 5. Wɔ akuraa no ase no, asɔredan ne sukuu wɔ hɔ. Esiane sɛ akuraa no atew ne ho kɛse nti, Nzulezo nya akwahosan ho haw ahorow pii, a asramma a ɛtrɛw kɛse ka ho.[1]

1, 2. (a) Dɛn na Yehowa asomfo fi bere tenten ayɛ? (b) Dɛn na ɛho hia Yehowa kɛse?
YEHOWA asomfo anokwafo fi bere tenten asisi adan de ahyɛ ne din anuonyam. Sɛ nhwɛso no, Israelfo de anigye boae ma wosii ntamadan no, na woyii wɔn yam de ɛho nneɛma mae.—Ex. 35:30-35; 36:1, 4-7.
2 Ɛnyɛ nneɛma a yɛde sisi adan no titiriw na Yehowa bu no sɛ ɛhyɛ ne din anuonyam, na saa ara nso na ɛnyɛ nneɛma no na ɛho hia no kɛse. (Mat. 23:16, 17) Akyɛde a ɛsɔ Yehowa ani na ɛhyɛ no anuonyam sen biara ne ɔsom a n’aso
... 
akyi nti, adwuma biara nni hɔ a yɛrentumi nyɛ. (Mat. 19:26) Bɛyɛ mfe 15 ntam, efi afe 1999 besi afe 2013 no, na Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo nam saa nhyehyɛe yi so asisi Ahenni Asa 26,849. * Yehowa gu so rehyira asɛnka adwuma no so, enti bere a eduu afe 2013 no, na yɛda so ara hia Ahenni Asa bɛyɛ 6,500 wɔ saa aman no mu, na seesei ɛsɛ sɛ yesisi ɔhaha pii afe biara.
10-12. Ɔkwan bɛn so na Ahenni Asa a yɛasisi no ahyɛ Yehowa din anuonyam?
10 Ɔkwan bɛn so na saa Ahenni Asa foforo a wɔasisi no ahyɛ Yehowa din
...
i Asa mpempem pii a wɔasisi wɔ wiase nyinaa no yɛ adanse a edi mũ a ɛkyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no wɔ hɔ ampa na ɛredi tumi seesei. Hwɛ hokwan a yɛanya sɛ yɛreyɛ adwuma ama Ɔhene Yesu Kristo ma ɛde anuonyamhyɛ kɛse abrɛ Yehowa!

Onipa koma mu awerɛhow botow no, na asɛmpa ma edi ahurusi.—Mmeb. 12:25.
Paulo ma yehui sɛ obi a ɛyɛ n’asɛde sɛ ɔhyɛ afoforo nkuran mpo, ɛyɛ a ɔno nso hia nkuranhyɛ. Paulo kyerɛw Kristofo a na wɔwɔ Roma no sɛ: “Me ho pere me sɛ mehu mo, na mama mo honhom mu akyɛde bi sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a mo ase betim; anaa me ne mo nyinaa, obiara benya nkuranhyɛ afi ne yɔnko hɔ denam ne yɔnko gyidi so, me ne mo nyinaa de.” (Rom. 1:11, 12) Nokwasɛm ne sɛ, Paulo a na otumi hyɛ afoforo nkuran pa ara no, ɛtɔ da a na ɔno nso
... 
moa ne akwankyerɛ?’ Bere tenten bi a atwam no, odwontofo bi kaa sɛ, sɛ yɛkɔ ahohia mu a, ehia sɛ yɛma yɛn ani so kyerɛ Yehowa hwehwɛ mmoa. (Dw. 123:1-4) Ɔkaa sɛ, sɛ yɛhwɛ Yehowa a, na yɛayɛ sɛ akoa bi a ɔhwɛ ne wura. Saa asɛm a odwontofo no kae no kyerɛ sɛn? Akoa hwɛ ne wura sɛ ne wura no bɛma no aduan na wabɔ ne ho ban. Nanso ehia sɛ akoa no hwɛ ne wura a onyi n’ani mfi ne so da sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obehu nea ne wura pɛ na wayɛ ama no. Yɛn nso, ehia sɛ yɛhwehwɛ Onyankopɔn Asɛm mu da biara da na yehu n
...
mi ahwɛ kwan sɛ yebenya ahofadi ankasa a na anka Adam ne Hawa wɔ no. Asɛm a Yesu kaa sɛ, “sɛ motena m’asɛm mu a” no ma yehu sɛ, sɛ yɛpɛ sɛ Yesu ma yɛde yɛn ho a, nneɛma bi wɔ hɔ a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ, na ebi nso wɔ hɔ a ɛnsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ. (Yoh. 8:31) Esiane sɛ yɛyɛ Kristofo a yɛahyira yɛn ho so nti, yɛapa yɛn ho akyi, na yɛakyerɛ sɛ yɛde Kristo nkyerɛkyerɛ bɛbɔ yɛn bra sɛ n’asuafo. (Mat. 16:24) Sɛnea Yesu hyɛɛ bɔ no, sɛ yenya n’agyede afɔre no so mfaso koraa daakye a, ɛnna yɛbɛde yɛn ho ampa. w18.04 7 ¶14-16

27Ayeyi nka Awurade, yɛn agyanom Nyankopɔn a ɔmaa ɔhene adwene sɛ onsiesie Awurade asɔredan a ɛwɔ Yerusalem no. 28Na ayeyi nka no sɛ, ɔdaa ne dɔ kann adi kyerɛɛ me, hyɛɛ me anuonyam wɔ ɔhene, nʼagyinatufo ne nʼahenemma atumfo no anim. Ɛhyɛɛ me nkuran, efisɛ na Awurade, me Nyankopɔn, nsa wɔ me so. Na meboaboaa Israel ntuanofo no bi ano sɛ wɔnka me ho mma yɛnkɔ Yerusalem.

Ban ho akontaabu
Dwumadi no bu nnua dodow a ɛho hia na wɔde asisi ban no ho akontaa.
Afei nso, wɔbu kwan a ɛda adum no ntam na wɔbu ban nneɛma dodoɔ: dadeɛ ahama, board anaa sheet nneɛma.
Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wuhu adansi nneɛma a wɔde di dwuma ho ka a, kyerɛ ne bo wɔ wo mantam no mu aguadidan ahorow mu.
Sɛ wɔahyɛ no agyirae a "
optimize akwansin a ɛda posts ntam", afei dwumadi no bɛkyekyɛ ban adum no mu pɛpɛɛpɛ wɔ beae no afã biara na wɔayɛ nsakrae wɔ ɔkwan a ɛda wɔn ntam no mu.
Hyɛ no nsow sɛ wɔde apon ano adum no aka akontaabu no ho dedaw.

Mɔɔ bɛzɔnenle Gyisɛse bɛwiele la, sunsum nwuanzanwuanza ne vale ye hɔle fienemgbole ne anu. Yeanli debie kenle 40, yemɔti ɛhɔne hunle ye. Akee Abɔnsam razɔle Gyisɛse nleanle na ɔhanle kɛ: ‘Saa ɛle Nyamenle ara a, ka kile awolɛ ɛhye mɔ maa bɛhakyi paano.’ Noko Gyisɛse vale Ngɛlɛlera ne anu edwɛkɛ buale kɛ: ‘Bɛhɛlɛ kɛ tɛ aleɛ angome a maa sonla tɛnla ngoane nu a. Ɔwɔ kɛ ɛtie edwɛkɛ biala mɔɔ Gyihova kɛha la.’
Eza Abɔnsam hanle hilele Gyisɛse kɛ: ‘Saa ɛle Nyamenle Ara amgba a, ɛvi ɛzonlenlɛ sua ne ati zo fuandi ɛ nwo te aze. Bɛhɛlɛ kɛ Nyamenle bazoa ye anwumabɔvolɛma yeamaa bɛazɔ wɔ.’ Noko Gyisɛse vale Ngɛlɛlera ne anu edwɛkɛ hanle kɛ: ‘Bɛhɛlɛ kɛ mmasɔ Gyihova ɛnea.’
Akee Seetan vale ewiade arelemgbunlililɛ kɔsɔɔti nee nuhua anwonyia yɛɛ anyunlunyia hilele Gyisɛse na ɔhanle kɛ: ‘Saa ɛsonle me kokye ala a, mebava ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ amuala meamaa wɔ.’ Noko Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ: ‘Fi ɛke kɔ Seetan! Bɛhɛlɛ kɛ Gyihova angome a ɔwɔ kɛ ɛsonle ye a.’
Akee Abɔnsam hɔle, na anwumabɔvolɛma rale na bɛmaanle Gyisɛse aleɛ bɛmaanle ɔlile. Ɔvi mekɛ zɔhane, Gyisɛse bɔle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo edwɛkpa ne nolo. Gyima mɔɔ bɛzoanle ye wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo kɛ ɔrayɛ la ɛne. Menli anye liele mɔɔ ɔhilehilele bɛ la anwo, na ɛleka biala mɔɔ ɔhɔle la bɛdoale ye.

DƐN NE GYIDI?
Sɛ Bible ka “gyidi” a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ obi wɔ adanse a edi mũ wɔ biribi ho, enti ogye tom. Sɛ obi wɔ Onyankopɔn mu gyidi a, ɔwɔ ahotoso sɛ ne bɔhyɛ nyinaa bɛba mu.
DƐN NA MOSE DE KYERƐE SƐ ƆWƆ GYIDI?
Mose de n’adwene nyinaa sii Onyankopɔn bɔhyɛ ahorow so. (Genesis 22:15-18) Ná anka Mose betumi adi yiye wɔ Egypt, nanso wamfa n’adwene ankɔ so, na mmom “ɔpawee sɛ ɔbɛma wɔatan ɔne Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo ani mmom sen sɛ obenya bɔne mu anigye bere tiaa bi.” (Hebrifo 11:25) Nea ɔyɛe no, akyiri yi o
... 
 biribi abɔ ne nkurɔfo ho ban. Enti, na Mose pɛ sɛ Israelfo no nyinaa nya saa awerɛhyem no bi. Yɛkenkan sɛ: “Mose ka kyerɛɛ nkurɔfo no sɛ: ‘Munnsuro. Munnyina pintinn na monhwɛ sɛnea Yehowa begye mo nkwa nnɛ.’” (Exodus 14:13) Mose tumi hyɛɛ ne kuromfo no gyidi den anaa? Otumi yɛe, efisɛ Bible ka Mose ne Israelfo nyinaa ho asɛm sɛ: “Gyidi nti wɔfaa Po Kɔkɔɔ no mu te sɛ nea wɔnam asase kesee so.” (Hebrifo 11:29) Mose nyaa ne gyidi so akatua, na obiara a ɔwɔ saa gyidi no bi nso benya so akatua.
DƐN
...
 yɛbɛyɛ nhwɛso a, awofo a wodwen wɔn mma ho nim sɛ wɔwɔ adwuma kɛse sɛ wɔboa wɔn mma ma wonya Onyankopɔn mu gyidi. Bere a mmofra no renyin no, biribi a ɛho hia paa a ɛsɛ sɛ awofo ma wohu ne sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ, na ɔno na ɔkyerɛ yɛn papa ne bɔne. Afei nso, ɛsɛ sɛ awofo ma wɔn mma hu sɛ, sɛ wodi Onyankopɔn mmara so a, ebesi wɔn yiye. (Yesaia 48:17, 18) Ɛyɛ akyɛde kɛse sɛ awofo bɛboa wɔn mma ama wɔanya Onyankopɔn mu gyidi sɛ “ɔwɔ hɔ, na ɔyɛ wɔn a wɔn ani abere rehwehwɛ no no katuafo.”—Hebrifo 11:6.

ENTI NNIPAKUW KԐSE A ԐWƆ ADIYISԐM NO WƆ ASASE SO BERE A HARMAGEDON BԐPAE AGU?
Adiyisɛm 7:9, 15: …“hwɛ! Nnipakuw kɛse a onipa biara antumi ankan wɔn a wofi amanaman ne mmusuakuw ne nkurɔfokuw ne kasa horow mu gyinagyina Ahengua no anim ne Oguammaa no anim. Na eyi nti na wogyina, Onyankopɔn ahengua no anim na wɔresom no anɔpa ne anadwo wɔ N’asɔrefie hɔ…”-Wiase Foforo Nkyerɛase.
Bɛyɛ mfe pii atwam Yehowa Adansefo akyerɛkyerɛ sɛ wɔn mu nnipa dodow no benya owusɔre atra Paradise Asase so afebɔɔ, afei nso nnipa 144000 a wɔapaw wɔn na wɔne Yesu Kristo bɛtraa adi hene wɔ Ɔsoro. Akyidifo akuw- abien yi na wɔfrɛ wɔn “Asase sofo” ne “Ɔsoro kɔfo”. Wɔsan frɛ Asase sofo no “Nguan foforo a ɛwɔ Yohane 10:16 ne “Kuw Kɛse” a ɛwɔ Adiyisɛm 7:9 ɛnna wɔfrɛ Ɔsoro kɔfo no “Nguankuw ketewa” a ɛwɔ Luka 12:32 ne “Nsrafo anaa Nkaefo” a ɛwɔ 2 Korintofo 1:21-22 ne Mpem Ɔha Aduanan Anan No”a ɛwɔ Adiyisɛm 7 ne 14. Nsɛmfua eyinom di akoten mpɛn pii wɔ Ɔwɛn Aban gyidi nhyehyɛe mu de si akuw abien yi so dua. Continue reading “Enti nnipakuw kɛse a ɛwɔ adiyisɛm no wɔ asase so bere a Harmagedon bɛpae agu?”

ME HYƐ ASE WƆ NYANKOPƆN NE DZIN MU, ƆDOMFO, MBƆBƆRHUFO NO.

Ɔkrantsee tashhud, tawwuz na Sura Al-Fatiha wiee no Hazrat Khalifatul Masi a ɔtɔdo enum (Allah mfa mboa kɛse nhyɛ no dzen) sanee Krantsee Sura Al Tauba ne nyiyimu duawͻtwe a ɔyɛ Kuran Krɔnkrɔn no ne tsir akron no.
Nyia ɔwɔ gyedzi wɔ Allah mu, Da a odzi Ewiei no, Ɔyɛ asɔr; otua ne Z
... 
edzinyi no su kor nye dɛ ofi Salat kor ne nyɛɛ kɛpem kor no, gyedzinyi n’akoma tsim wͻ asͻrfi mu. Dɛm nyimpa yi hyɛ ase dɛ ͻretweͻn dɛ ber bͻso ma ͻ’asan ayɛ asͻr bio ama ͻasan akͻ asͻrfi no mu bio akͻ sͻr.
Hwɛ, wiadze dwumadzi so hia ma nyimpa na Anohoba Mɛsia (ANN) esi no ewur aka akyerɛ hɛn dɛ, ofi Salat kor ntamu kɛpem kor no, onyia a ͻ’annyɛ n’ahyɛdze no wͻ nyiano yi. Ɔmmfa edwuma a ͻyɛ, sɛ ͻyɛ eguadzi O! apaadzi O! haban mu dwuma O! anaa edwuma biara. Dza ohia nye dɛ yɛbɛkaakaa Nyankopͻn w
...
o mu na koryɛ na akasakasa ba ber a mpaapaamu esi mu. Na dɛm mber yi na nkabͻmu na koryɛ na wͻ dɛ wͻma do na nsɛm nketsenketse a ͻdze mpaapaamu ba no woyi no akwa.
Nyankopͻn mboa hɛn ma yɛmfa dza ͻwͻ dɛ yɛyɛ do mbͻ hɛn bra. Amen!

Hadhrat Khalifatul Masih kaa ne Nyamesɛm no wͻ “Baitur Rahman Asͻredan mu wͻ Valencia a ɛwͻ Spain. Ɔkanee saa Kuraan kyɛfa a ɛdi soͻ yi:
“Na monsͻ Allah ahoma no mu dendenden
... 
a pɛ nanso ͻkyɛreeɛ. Ɔkaa sɛ, Huzoor ada Islam nkyerɛkyerɛ pa no adi. Saa nso ara na na ahͻhoͻ afoforͻ nso tesɛ amanyͻfoͻ, alͻyafoͻ, adͻkotafoͻ ne mmrahyɛ-bɛdwafoͻ nso wͻ hͻ. Na ahͻhoͻ no dodoͻ yɛ ͻha ne nwͻtwe (108), ɛfa adͻfoͻ a mmerɛ bi akyi na wͻtia yɛn nyinaa. Wͻtiee saa nkyerɛkyerɛ yi no, wͻn adwene mu daa hͻ. Wiase rehwɛ na ɛwͻ sɛ yɛyͻ y’asɛdeɛ. Saa asodie yi hia ma nteaseɛ.
Kyɛfa a ɛtͻso mienu a wͻkenkanee ahyɛaseɛ no kyerɛ sɛ; “moma nipa kuo bi nfiri mo mu a wͻbɛkyerɛ papa….. na wͻabra 
...
ͻ kwan biara so.

Onlayn wɔd kɔnta
Ɔmɔs wɔd dɛn mi tɛks gɛt?
Frɔm trade trade, wɔd dɛn na di men tin we dɛn kin yuz fɔ sho aw mɔtalman de tink. Wan wɔd nɔto jɔs wan ɔda lɛta dɛn; Na wan tin we gɛt in yon minin, we ebul fɔ transmit aydia, filin ɛn no. Filɔsofa dɛn dɔn rili lɛk wɔd dɛn, dɛn dɔn de fɛn di pawa we dɛn gɛt fɔ kech di men tin we tin dɛn de du ɛn di wok we dɛn de du fɔ tɔk to pipul dɛn ɛn ɔndastand dɛnsɛf.
Dis wɔd kɔnta we de na di Intanɛt na wɛb pej we de ripɔt di nɔmba fɔ di wɔd dɛn we dɛn yuz na wan tɛks. If wi no di nɔmba fɔ di wɔd dɛn, i go fayn fɔ mek wi ebul fɔ du wetin di tɛks lɔng ɔ fɔ mek wi rayt fayn fayn wan.
Instrɔkshɔn dɛn fɔ yuz am simpul. Fɔ no ɔmɔs wɔd dɛn gɛt, yu jɔs nid fɔ put am na di say we dɛn sho ɛn di nɔmba fɔ di wɔd dɛn we mek am go apia ɔtomɛtik. Di mɔni we dɛn ripɔt kin rifresh wantɛm wantɛm we dɛn chenj di tɛks we yu dɔn put. I fayn fɔ mek wan rɛd ‘X’ apia we de alaw di pɔsin we de yuz am fɔ klia di tɛks eria.
Dɛn mek dis wɔd ad fɔ wok fayn fayn wan na ɛni brɔuzhɔ ɛn pan ɛni skrin saiz. I jɔs de wok wit langwej dɛn we kin separet dɛn wɔd dɛn wit wayt spɛs, pan ɔl we i kin tek ɔda we dɛn bak fɔ separet bitwin wɔd dɛn.

Baebolo Nwuanzanwuanza ne le Nyamenle edwɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ bɛmaa yɛ muala a. Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛsukoa na yɛnwu ye Kɛlɛvolɛ ne. (Dwɔn 17:3; 2 Timote 3:16) Gyihova maa yɛnwu bodane mɔɔ ɔlɛ ɔmaa alesama nee azɛlɛ ye mɔɔ le bɛ sua nu la wɔ nu.—Gyɛnɛsese 3:15; Yekile 21:3, 4.
Buluku gyɛne biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ ka menli ɛbɛlabɔlɛ zɛhae a. Baebolo ne ka yɛ maa yɛda Nyamenle subane mɔɔ le ɛlɔlɛ, anwunvɔnezelɛ nee ahunluyelɛyelalɛ la ali. Ɔmaa anyelazo, na ɔboa menli ɔmaa bɛgyinla amaneɛnwunlɛ mɔɔ anu yɛ se kpalɛ bɔbɔ l
... 
 aneɛ kɛyɛ 3,000 anu. Yemɔ a le buluku mɔɔ bɛhile ɔ bo na bɛva dɔɔnwo bɛmaa wɔ tetedwɛkɛ nu a. Kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔba ye la ɛne. Baebolo ngapezo ka kɛ: “Bɛbabɔ Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo edwɛkpa ɛhye [edwɛkɛ titili mɔɔ wɔ Baebolo ne anu la] nolo wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo amuala bɛava bɛali maanle maanle ne amuala daselɛ, kolaa na awieleɛ ne ara.”—Mateyu 24:14.
Kɛmɔ yɛnwu kɛ Baebolo ne anu edwɛkɛ ne anwo hyia la ati, yɛ bodane a le kɛ yɛyɛ Baebolo mɔɔ nuhua edwɛkɛ ne le nɔhalɛ kɛ mɔlebɛbo ɛdeɛ ne na eza nuhua la ɛkɛ m
...
wɛkɛ.
Menli mɔɔ kulo Gyihova Nyamenle na bɛsonle ye la kulo Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ bɛhile ɔ bo kpalɛ na ndelebɛbo wɔ nu la. (1 Timote 2:4) Ɛhye ati a yɛyɛ Baebolo ɛhye wɔ Nzema nu a, amaa bodane mɔɔ yɛlɛ kɛ yɛkile Ewiade Fofolɛ Ngilebɛbo ne abo yɛahɔ aneɛ dɔɔnwo anu la ara nu. Kengavolɛ, yɛ anyelazo nee yɛ asɔneyɛlɛ a le kɛ, Ngɛlɛlera Nwuanzanwuanza ɛhye baboa wɔ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛlɛbɔ mɔdenle ‘wɔakpondɛ Nyamenle abo zo kɔkpula kɛ ɛkɛnwu ye’ la.—Gyima ne 17:27.
Ewiade Fofolɛ Baebolo Ngilebɛbo Kɔmatii

Ofi tsetseberdo na Jehovah apɛ dɛ ebusua biara mufo bɔbɔ mu ayɛ adze, mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ a wɔnye no benya ebusuabɔ a no mu yɛ dzen na aaboa hɔn ma woeetum ayɛ kor. (Deuteronomy 6:6, 7) Iyi ntsi na Jehovah Adasefo yi ber bi si hɔ wɔ dapɛn biara mu na aama ebusua no asom abɔ mu. Wɔyɛ iyi dze nam Bible mu nsɛm a hɔn nyinara fi enyigye mu susũ ho ma ɔfa hɔn ebusua no ehiadze ho no. Sɛ wankotsee mpo na etse a, dɛm aber yi yɛ hokwan a oye paa a ibotum dze esũa Bible ho nwoma bi a eyi esi hɔ, na ama eetum atwe
... 
bɔbɔ mu akenkan Bible no dzen. Sɛ ɔbɛyɛ yie a hom ndzi dapɛn dapɛn Bible akenkan ho nhyehyɛɛ a wɔayɛ ama Asetsena nye Ɔsom Edwuma Nhyiamu no ekyir. Hom botum etwa akenkan ne fã bi ama ebusua no munyi biara, na afei hom nyinara botum esusũ esũadze a hom enya efi Kyerɛwnsɛm no mu no ho.
Ɔyɛ ber a ebusua no mufo dze bɛn hɔnho. Sɛ kun na yer, anaa awofo nye hɔn mba, sũa Bible no bɔ mu dɛ ebusua a, ɔhyɛ hɔn ebusuabɔ no mu dzen. Ɔsɛ dɛ ɔyɛ enyigye nye asomdwee ber a ebusua no mufo nyinara hwɛ kwan wɔ 
...
ɔ JW Broadcasting (tv.jw.org) do no bi, na sɛ hom wie a hom eesusũ ho? Hom botum so esũa ndwom a wɔbɔtow wɔ asafo nhyiamu ase na sɛ hom wie ebusua som no a, hom dze biribi akekã hom ano dze agye hom enyi.
Dɛm ber tsitsir yi a hom bɔbɔ mu asom dapɛn biara no bɔboa ebusua no mufo nyinara ma hɔn enyi agye Nyankopɔn Asɛm ho, na obehyira hom mbɔdzembɔ no do kɛsenara.
Ebɛnadze ntsi na yeyi ber bi si hɔ dze yɛ ebusua som?
Awofo bɛyɛ dɛn etum ama ebusua som ase ayɛ enyigye ama ebusua no mufo no nyinara?

Bechem yɛ kuro na ɛyɛ Tano Atifi mantam ahenkuro wɔ Ahafo a wɔwɔ Ghana mu, na Bechem yɛ mantam ahenkuro ma Tano Atifi Mantam no . Bechem bɛn Bono ahenkurow Sunyani . Wonim kurow no sɛ ɛhɔ na Bechem Presbyterian Ntoaso Sukuu no wɔ. Sukuu no yɛ ntoasoɔ sukuu. Kurow no wɔ akyerɛkyerɛfo ntetee sukuu a ɛyɛ sen biara wɔ ɔman no mu a wɔfrɛ no St. Joseph kɔlege (JOSCO) no mu biako, na ɛwɔ nkuraa mienu a wonim no sɛ Techimantia ne Derma a mienu no nyinaa agye din wɔ tomato a wɔyɛ wɔ ɔman no mu ho no.
Ɛyɛ Bechem United Football Club a mprempren wɔbɔ wɔ top division wɔ Ghana no fie.

Yehowa Adansefo bɔ mmɔden sɛ yebesiesie yɛn ara yɛn mmusua, na yɛboa nkurɔfo nso ma wɔyɛ saa ara. Yegye di sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔhyehyɛɛ abusua. (Genesis 2:21-24; Efesofo 3:14, 15) Ɔde aware ho afotu ama wɔ Bible mu. Saa afotu no aboa nnipa a ɛwɔ wiase baabiara ama wɔn aware asɔ.
Sɛnea Yehowa Adansefo Boa Nkurɔfo Ma Wɔn Mmusua Yɛ Kama
Yɛbɔ mmɔden sɛ yɛde Bible afotu bɛyɛ adwuma. Ɛno ma yɛyɛ okununom pa, ɔyerenom a yɛbɔ yɛn ho mmɔden, ne awofo a yedi yɛn asɛde ho dwuma yiye. (Mmebusɛm 31:10-31; Efeso
... 
yɛɛ aware a awarefo no mu baako abɛyɛ Yehowa Danseni mu nhwehwɛmu, na wɔde ho amanneɛbɔ too gua afe 1998. Wohui sɛ, aware a ɛte saa no, sɛ wofa emu 20 a, baako deɛ bere a ɔbaako bɛyɛɛ Yehowa Danseni no, ɛkɔfaa ɔhaw bae.
Yesu ka too hɔ sɛ, sɛ obi de ne nkyerɛkyerɛ bɔ ne bra a, ebetumi akɔfa ɔhaw aba ɔne n’abusua ntam. (Mateo 10:32-36) Abakɔsɛm kyerɛwfo bi a wɔfrɛ no Will Durant kaa sɛ, wɔ Roma Ahemman no mu no, “na wɔka sɛ Kristosom sɛe fie.” * Ɛnnɛ nso, wɔka asɛm koro no ara fa Yehowa Adansefo b
...
ɛ, “aware a awarefo no nyinaa gyidi yɛ baako, na wɔbom som” no, wɔn aware taa sɔ. *—Journal of Marriage and Family.
Nanso, sɛ Yehowa Danseni bi hokafo nyɛ Ɔdansefo a, Yehowa Adansefo renhyɛ Ɔdansefo no da sɛ onnyaa no. Bible ka sɛ: “Sɛ onua bi wɔ yere a onnye nni, na sɛ ɔbea no pene so sɛ ɔne no bɛtena a, ɛnsɛ sɛ ogyaa no; na sɛ ɔbea bi nso wɔ kunu a onnye nni, na sɛ ɔbarima no pene so sɛ ɔne no bɛtena a, ɛnsɛ sɛ ogyaa ne kunu no.” (1 Korintofo 7:12, 13) Yehowa Adansefo de saa asɛm no yɛ adwuma.

... 
o. Bɛdedɛ konle ninyɛne dɔɔnwo. Eza bɛlɛsɛkye azɛlɛ ne wɔ adenle fofolɛ zo. Ninyɛne mɔɔ boa maa yɛtɛnla aze—anwoma mɔɔ yɛdie, nyɛmoa nee mbaka mɔɔ boa bɛ nwo, nyevile ne—ɛlɛsɛkye ɔluakɛ alesama ɛnnea ninyɛne zo boɛ.

ama ne kɔkɔ wɔ esiane kpole mɔɔ ɛlɛba alesama anwo zo la. Wiase Nyinaa Wɛbsaet (WWW), a wɔtaa frɛ no Wɛbsaet no yɛ nsɛm ho nhyehyɛe a ɛma wotumi de nsɛm kyɛ wɔ Intanɛt so. Wɔayɛ no akwan a ɛyɛ mmerɛw so sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɛbɛma wɔn a wɔde di dwuma no ani agye asen IT ho abenfo ne wɔn a wɔn ani gye ho dada mpo. Ɛsan nso boa ma wɔn nsa ka nkrataa ne wɛbsaet nneɛma afoforo a ɛwɔ Intanɛt so denam mmara pɔtee bi a wɔfrɛ no Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP).[1]
Wɔnam wɛb server so tumi ma wɔtwe nkrataa ne nsɛm afoforɔ kɔ ne
... 
frɛɛ no ‘browsing,’ ‘wɛb surfing’ (wɔ channel surfing akyi), anaa ‘navigating the Web’. Nhwehwɛmu a edi kan a wɔyɛe wɔ saa suban foforo yi ho no hwehwɛɛ sɛnea nkurɔfoɔ de di dwuma wɔ wɛb brawsa ahoroɔ so. Sɛ nhwɛso no, nhwehwɛmu bi huu akwan anum a wɔfa so de di dwuma: exploratory surfing, window surfing, evolved surfing, bounded navigation ne targeted navigation.[12]

Ireland
Amanfour a Ireland no mu na ɔbɛyii se ne ho nipadua a ɛyɛ kyɛn Europe no so ntɛm kɛkema asɛnka yi. Ɔmemme ne Northern Ireland nnuanom nyinaa afoforo mu daa wɔ afirika tɔ so anan mu tong so tɔ so mmienu, nsa wɔn a atɔ no foforɔ ne nsɛm pɛ mu wɔte. Ireland no mu ɛnam dzɛnkrɔɔmantɔ, Michael. D. Higgins ewie no de prɛsident. Ireland no edu aduan ne Ga ne English hyɛn sen; Dublin fo no de adusafo amanehunu. Ireland yare no nso bɛkum wɔ mpremprensem de atoafom no mu hɛn, 4.9 miliɔn nnʼani mu,

yɛ

- Bɔ mfutumfo ha ne hwidofoɔ no din a wɔwɔ bosome bi mu no, bɔ gye kɔkɔɔ yi so ne ɔman no ho nyinaa. Firi fere a ɛmpɛ na yɛdeba no mu a, bɔ nokware bi a wɔwɔ bi afaya a wɔwɔ Ireland nnwom no so wɔbɔɔ kɔɔ Dublin bɔhyɛ.

 highlife ne sowahɔ no dua. Nso bɔɔ ɔhaw biakyeɛ, bɛyɛ ɔsuo hyeren sen akwasihene ne dumuɔ no a nimdeeɛ na gyina Ireland no yɛ raw wɔ adasafo biara nhɛ so.
- Sɛ Ghanafoɔ nim sɛ, Ireland kasa bɔ wɔɔ aduan, anaa daa ntontom mu ne ntonto no a ɛsɔ wɔn deɛ ɛbɛyɛ a ɛde bɛnte ase. Sɛ wobɛkasa aboutoadeɛ no, para odwumfoɔɔ no ne henemmafoɔɔ no, anaa sɛ wokufuɔ no dodoɔ no, wobɛnnidi ntontom a ɛdi kan no mu na wobɛdi wɔn animdeɛ ahoɔden no. Ireland nua na nyansa da a aboa a ɛdeɛn na yɛdeɛ yeɛ yiye no yi.

Banku (pronunciation of "Banku" (help·info)) yɛ tete din bi a ɛwɔ Ga-Dangme(Ga) kasa mu a wɔnya firii aburo mmɔle ne bankye mmɔle a aboro a yaka afera, aka abobɔ no kama. Ga-Dangme kasa mu na yɛnyaa saa din no firi. Yɛwɔ sɛdeɛ wɔsi ka saa din a ɛne no sɛ nanso ne nkyerɛaseɛ nnyɛ pɛ wɔ kasa no mu, ebi ne inku(ma nkuu wɔ Ha kasa mu), Ashanku(ma sɛdeɛ wɔde borɔdeɛ yɛ aduane bi a yɛfrɛ no Tatale wɔ Ga kasa mu), ne afoforɔ a n'awieeɛ yɛ "ku". i.[7]
Sɛ woreyɛ mmɔle no a ɛfa mmerɛ pii. Wobɛdwa bankye na woatwitwa de afra aburo de agu nsuom ama adeɛ akye. Wobɛsɔne nsuo no afirim na wakɔyam bankye no ne aburo no ama no afe fekɔfekɔ na asane afɔ. Nea edi so wɔ ne yɛ mu ne sɛ wobɛfete mmɔle no ama no aboro. Ɛdi bɛyɛ nnanu anaa nnanum a ɛgyina senea ewiem nsakraeɛ teɛ no.[8] Hono aburo mmɔle no ne bankye mmɔle no dadesɛn mu. “Hwɛ! Oye a eye ne fɛ a ɛyɛ sɛ anuanom bom tena biakoyɛ mu!”—DWOM 133:1.
Ade a ɛma ebinom di Buronya.
Esiane sɛ na Israelfo no nyinaa yɛ Yakob anaa Israel asefo nti, na wɔn nyinaa yɛ “anuanom” anaa abusua biako. Sɛ wohyia wɔ Yerusalem di afahyɛ a, na “eye” na ɛyɛ “fɛ” nso. Ɛnnɛ nso, nnipa bebree te nka sɛ edu Buronya bere a, “eye,” na ɛyɛ “fɛ” sɛ wɔne wɔn abusuafo behyia te sɛ Israelfo no.
Dɛn na ɛma ɛyɛ den?
Nhoma bi ka sɛ: “Ɛyɛ a na nsɛm hyehyɛ abusuafo mu a wɔmmɔ so wɔ afe no mu, nanso sɛ abu

Mutum nye nyimpa a ɔtse dɛm no kasa, mekã dɛ mbrɛ metse nka ho asɛm kyerɛ no na menye no bɔ me haw ho nkɔmbɔ. M’anyɛnkofo a wɔdwe na wɔbrɛ hɔnho adze no, hɔn na mebɛn hɔn papaapa.”

Jesus kãa asɛm bi dze kyerɛɛ dɛ ɔtse siantsir a wɔdedae no ase. Ɔkãa dɛ: ‘Sunsum pɛ dze, na honam yɛ mberɛw.’ (Matt. 26:40, 41) Osi

 na iyi ama menya enyigye na akomatɔyamu.”
Nokwasɛm nye dɛ, ɔsɛ dɛ hɛn nyinara yɛyer hɛnho papaapa dɛ yɛbɛda ɔdwe edzi. Onua kor kãa dɛ: “Nokwasɛm nye dɛ, ndɛ na ndɛ nyina, ɔtɔ da a mo bo tum fuw araa ma munnhu mbrɛ menyɛ moho.” Naaso Jehovah a ɔhyɛ hɛn nkuran dɛ yɛnda ɔdwe edzi no, bɔboa hɛn wɔ dɛm ɔkõ yi mu. (Isa. 41:10; 1 Tim. 6:11) Jehovah botum ‘ayɛ hɛn mũ’ na obotum ‘ahyɛ hɛn dzen.’ (1 Pet. 5:10) Tse dɛ Paul no, mber rokɔ do no, yebotum esũasua “Christ no dwe nye ne tsema” no.—2 Cor. 10:1.

Wɔ August 4, 2020 no, ammonium nitrate a ɛyɛ bɛyɛ metric tɔn 2750 a wɔde asie wɔ Beirut, Lebanon hyɛn gyinabea a ɛnyɛ den no sɔree na ɛmaa ɔtopae kɛse bi a ɛkɔ soro a ɛsɛee tete kurow no afã akɛse.
𝐁𝐞𝐢𝐫U𝐭 2020
Nneɛma abien a ɛpaee, a nea ɛto so abien no sõ sen nea edi kan no koraa no, bɔɔ Beirut kurow no mu Yawda anwummere anɔpatutuutu, na anyɛ yiye koraa no, ekunkum nnipa 154, na epirapira bɛboro 5,000 na ɛsɛee nneɛma pii. Sɛnea Lebanon akwahosan soafo, Hamad Hassan, kyerɛ no, wɔde nnipa bɛboro 1,000 akɔ ayaresabea, na na 120 da so ara wɔ tebea a emu yɛ den mu Fida.
Ɔpae a ɛto so abien no maa ahurututu bi a ɛyɛ kɔkɔɔ a ɛrehuruhuruw kɔɔ soro wɔ kurow no hyɛn gyinabea no atifi na ɛmaa asorɔkye bi a ɛyɛ hu bae a ɛbubuu ahwehwɛ akwansin pii. Ɛmfa ho adwuma kɛse bi a wɔhwehwɛ mu no, wɔda so ara gye di sɛ nnipa du du pii ayera wɔ kurow a ɛyɛ Lebanon ahenkurow a ɛwɔ Mediterranea mpoano apuei fam no mu.
Bere a atumfoɔ no reboaboa nea esii no ano no, ɛha na yɛahwɛ nea yenim ne nea yennim.
Dɛn na ɛde nneɛma a ɛpaee no bae?
Wonnya nhuu nea ɛde ba ankasa, nanso ogya bi sɛee hyɛn gyinabea bi adekoradan bi bɛyɛ 6 p.m. Ná nneɛma abien a ɛpaee, ketewaa bi a ɛpaee kɛse bi a ɛsɛee kurow no fã bi dii akyi wɔ sikani kakraa bi akyi.

Koo Nimo
Agya Koo Nimo yɛ abakɔnnwom mu nimdeɛni titiriw a ofi Ghana. Ɔsan nso bɔ nnwom a ɛde abibimaneɛ ne amanɔne nneyɛe ɛfra. Koo Nimo (a wɔsan frɛ no Daniel Amponsah, wɔ mmere a ɔwɔ Britain man mu no) yɛ ɔdehye esan sɛ ne nuabea waree ɔhene. Ahenfie na osuaa sɛnea wɔbɔ kete nnonnoo. Ansa odii mfe du-nkron nsan sɛ ne nuabea waree ɔhene. Ahenfie na osuaa sɛnea wɔbɔ kete nnonnoo. Ansa odii mfe du-na kosnnwom tew ne ho fi abibiman tebea ho. Ɔyɛ Ghanani a odii kan bɔɔ nnwom wɔ CD so a na yɛakyerɛ
... 
Spain nneyɛe fra. Eyi nti ɔyɛ obi a abibiman nyinaa hyɛ no nso a wɔsan bu no yiye. Eyi yɛ hu pii esan sɛ ne nnwom tew ne ho fi abibiman tebea ho. Ɔyɛ Ghan mu. Mmere yi nyinaa no, na ɔdaso bɔ nnwom, ɛsan sua nnwom ho ade pii. Eyi nti no, na ɔda Ghana nnwomtokuw no ano.
Wɔ 1957 mu no, ɔtew nnwomto ne sankubɔkuw a wɔfrɛ no Adadam Agofomma a wɔn din kɔɔ kan yiye. Kete nnonnobɔ akyire no, ɔsan suaa Mɛfra. Koo Nimo (a wɔsan frɛ no Daniel Amponsah, wɔ mmere a ɔwɔ Britain man mu no) yɛ ɔdehye esan sɛ ne
...
se a yɛfrɛ hɔ Foase. Bere a ɔkɔɔ London wɔ adesua nti no, ɔkɔɔ MISSING ho sukuu. Ɔsan baa Ghana no, ɔbɛyɛɛ adwuma sɛ Chief Laboratory Technician wɔ Chemistry Department wɔ Kwame Nkrumah Suapɔn a ɛwɔ Kumasi. Ɔyɛɛ adwuma kosii afe 1998 suaa MISSING a wɔde nsatea abien bɔ. Eyi na yɛde kae no pa ara. Ko ɛde ɔman no din akɔ kan. Ɔde ne nneyɛe akyin Europe, Abibiman ne Amerika (Lincoln Center wɔ afe 1988 mu). Mmere bi a etwa mu kɔ no, na ɔyɛ dwontoni kyerɛkyerɛni a ɔte Washington Suapɔn a ɛwɔ Amɛrika.

Dɛm ntsi wɔdze Nephi no nkorɔfo ho abakɔsɛm nye Lamanfo so dze abɔmu etwitwa no ntsiatsia akyerɛw—Wɔkyerɛwee dze kɛmaa Lamanfo a wɔyɛ Israelfifo nkaa; nye Jewfo na Amanamamfo no mu biara so—Wɔnam mbrasɛm na nkɔnhyɛ sunsum nye nyikyerɛ kwan do kyerɛwee—Wɔkyerɛwee na wɔsɔɔw ano na wɔdze siei maa Ewuradze amma wɔannsɛɛ no—Ama wɔnam Nyankopɔn n’akyɛdze na no tum do woeyi epue na wɔakyerɛ ase—Moroni dze ne nsa sɔɔw ano na ɔdze siei maa Ewuradze, ama wɔnam Amanamamfo do woeyi epue wɔ n’aber ano—Wɔnam Nyankopɔn no tum akyɛdze do bɛkyerɛ ase.
Ne fã bi so a woyii fii Ether Nwoma mu no so yɛ abakɔsɛm a ɔfa Jared no nkorɔfo a wɔbɔɔ hɔn petsee wɔ aber a nna worisi abantsentsen dze akɔ sor no na Ewuradze totõo hɔn kasaa no ho—Ama wɔdze aakyerɛ Israelfifo nkaa ma woehu ndzɛmba akɛse a Ewuradze yɛe maa hɔn egyanom; na woehu Ewuradze n’ahyɛmu no, dɛ wɔnntow hɔn nnkyenee afebɔɔ—Na afei so ama Jewfo na Amanamamfo no mu biara so aagye edzi dɛ Jesus nye Christ no, Onnyiewiei Nyankopɔn no, reda noho edzi akyerɛ aman nyinara—Na afei sɛ mfom bi wɔ mu a nna ofi nyimpa; dɛm ntsi mma hom nnkasa nntsia ndzɛmba a Nyame ayɛ, amma woeennya hom ho nkekaa wɔ Christ n’atsɛmbu egua no enyim.

Kristo mmae no atirimpɔw ne sɛn?
Ansa na Yesu Kristo rekɔ soro afe 33 Y.B. no, ɔhyɛɛ bɔ sɛ ɔbɛsan aba. Ɔmaa mfatoho bi kyerɛe sɛ ɔte sɛ ɔdehye bi a otuu kwan kɔhyɛɛ mu kyɛe, na ɔsan bae no, na wanya tumi a ɔde rebedi hene. Enti Yesu mmae no atirimpɔw ne sɛ, ɔde aban papa rebrɛ nnipa.
Yesu de aban papa bɛbrɛ nnipa
Nipadua bɛn na na Kristo de bɛba? Owui no, Onyankopɔn nyanee no ma ɔbɛyɛɛ honhom abɔde a yɛmfa yɛn ani nhu no. (1 Petro 3:18) Afei ɔkɔɔ soro kɔtenaa Onyankopɔn nsa nifa. (Dwom 110:1) Akyiri yi, Yehowa Nyankopɔn, “Nea ne nna akyɛ” no, maa Yesu begyinaa n’anim, na ɔmaa no tumi a ɔde bedi nnipa so. Enti Yesu ansan amma sɛ onipa; mmom ɔbae no, na ɔyɛ Ɔhene wɔ soro.
Sɛ Yesu san ba a, dɛn na ɔbɛyɛ?
Sɛ Yesu san ba a n’abɔfo ka ne ho a, obebu nnipa atɛn. Ɔbɛsɛe amumɔyɛfo, na wɔn a wogye no tom sɛ Ɔhene no, wama wɔn daa nkwa.
Sɛ Yesu bedi asase so hene a, ɔbɛma asase adan paradise. Obenyan awufo asan aba nkwa mu abɛtena saa Paradise asase no so ma wɔn ani agye.

Bere a Nebukadnesar de Yudafo mmerante a wofi ahemfie kɔɔ Babilon no, ɔmaa ahemfie panyin bi a yɛfrɛ no Aspenas hwɛɛ wɔn so. Nebukadnesar ka kyerɛɛ Aspenas sɛ, ɔnhwɛ wɔn mu na onyi mmerantewa a wɔwɔ ahoɔden na wonim nyansa mma no. Ná wɔbɛtete saa mmerantewa yi mfe mmiɛnsa. Ná ntetee yi bɛma wɔabɛyɛ nnipa titiriw wɔ Babilon. Mmerantewa no besua Akkadia kasa a Babilonfo ka; wobesua sɛnea wɔbɛkyerɛw na wɔakenkan nso. Afei nso, na ɛsɛ sɛ wodi aduan a ɔhene no ne wɔn a wɔwɔ ahemfie hɔ di no bi. Mmera
... 
e Yehowa. Ná wonim sɛ Yehowa ahyɛ mmara sɛ mma wonni aduan a ɛho ntew. Enti na ɛnsɛ sɛ wodi ɔhene no aduan no. Wɔka kyerɛɛ Aspenas sɛ: ‘Yɛsrɛ wo, yɛmpɛ sɛ yedi ɔhene no aduan no.’ Aspenas ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: ‘Sɛ moanni na ɔhene hu sɛ mo anim ayɛ mmɔbɔmmɔbɔ a, obekum me!’
Biribi baa Daniel tirim. Ɔka kyerɛɛ nea ɔhwɛ wɔn so no sɛ: ‘Yɛsrɛ wo, ma yɛn afumduan nko ara ne nsu nna du. Afei fa yɛn toto mmerantewa a wobedi ɔhene aduan no ho.’ Nea ɔhwɛ wɔn so no penee so.
Nna du akyi no, na Daniel ne ne nna
...
na ohuu sɛ Daniel, Hanania, Misael ne Asaria adwenem abue, na wonim nyansa sen mmerantewa a aka no nyinaa. Oyii mmerantewa nnan yi sɛ wɔmma wɔnyɛ adwuma wɔ n’ahemfie hɔ. Sɛ asɛm bi kyere ɔhene adwene a, na ɔtaa frɛ wɔn bisa wɔn adwene wɔ ho. Yehowa na ɔma wohuu nyansa sen ɔhene no anyansafo ne wɔn a woyi nkonyaa no nyinaa.
Ɛwom sɛ na Daniel, Hanania, Misael ne Asaria wɔ obi man so deɛ, nanso wɔn werɛ amfi sɛ wɔyɛ Yehowa nkurɔfo. Wo nso, sɛ wowɔ baabi na w’awofo nni hɔ mpo a, wobɛkae Yehowa anaa?

BIBLE de Hebri asɛmfua sheʼohlʹ ne ne Hela sɛso haiʹdes di dwuma bɛboro mpɛn 70 wɔ kasa abien a wodii kan de kyerɛw Bible no mu. Nsɛmfua abien no nyinaa fa owu ho. Bible nkyerɛase bi kyerɛ ase “ɔdamoa,” “hell,” anaa “amoa.” Nanso, wonni nsɛmfua pɔtee a wɔde kyerɛ Hebri ne Hela nsɛmfua yi ase pɛpɛɛpɛ wɔ kasa dodow no ara mu. Enti New World Translation de nsɛmfua “Sheol” ne “Hades” na edi dwuma. Dɛn na saa nsɛmfua yi kyerɛ ankasa? Ma yɛnhwɛ sɛnea wɔde nsɛmfua yi di dwuma wɔ Bible afã horow bi.

... 
Afei nso, Bible mfa asɛmfua “Sheol” nnyina hɔ mma ɔdamoa bi a wosie nnipa dodow bi wom te sɛ abusua bi amusiei, anaa ɔdamoa bi a wosie nnipa pii wom.—Genesis 49:30, 31.
Ɛnde, ɛhe ankasa na wɔfrɛ no “Sheol” no? Onyankopɔn Asɛm kyerɛ sɛ “Sheol” anaa “Hades” kyerɛ biribi a ɛsen ɔdamoa kɛse bi a wosie nnipa pii wom koraa. Sɛ nhwɛso no, Fante Bible no ka wɔ Yesaia 5:14 sɛ Sheol “atrɛ n’akɔndɔ mu, na ɔahan n’anomu petoo.” Sɛnea yɛbɛka no no, ɛwom sɛ Sheol amene awufo pii a yennim wɔn dodow de, nanso ɛ
...
yerɛ a ɛne owusɔre no boa yɛn ma yenya “Sheol” ne “Hades” ho ntease foforo. Onyankopɔn Asɛm de Sheol ne Hades ka owu a owusɔre wom ho asɛm. * (Hiob 14:13, Fante Bible; Asomafo Nnwuma 2:31; Adiyisɛm 20:13) Onyankopɔn Asɛm ka nso sɛ ɛnyɛ nnipa a wɔasom Yehowa nkutoo na wɔwɔ Sheol anaa Hades, na mmom nnipa pii a wɔansom Onyankopɔn nso wɔ hɔ bi. (Genesis 37:35, NW; Dwom 55:15, Fante Bible) Enti, Bible kyerɛkyerɛ sɛ “bere bi bɛba a wɔn a wɔteɛ ne wɔn a wɔnteɛ bɛsɔre afi owu mu.”—Asomafo Nnwuma 24:15.

Yehowa mane Adam ne Hawa nningyein paa pẽe. Asomafoɛ 17:25
Brasua bɔ oli moa bɔ Yehowa bɔle ye ne yeɛ ole Hawa, na ɔfale ye mane Adam kyɛ ɔye.—Marko 10:6, 7.
Yehowa bɔle bɛ ne, né b’adwene ne bɛ nipadua di mu.
Né bɛ Paradise awuro ne yeɛ ole Eden turo. Né nzue bɔ ɔla berɛ, nnuaba ne ngaka bɔ bɛwɔ berɛ ne ma ɛberɛ yɛ nyemene.
Yehowa dwudwo hyirɛle bɛ, na ohyirehyirɛle bɛ. Sɛ betiele ye a, ahãa bɛkɔtena ase daa wɔ Paradise aseɛ so.
Nyameɛpiri hã hyirɛle bɛ kyɛ nnɛmaa bedi aduaba kõ bie. Genesis 2:16, 17, NWT
Yehowa hyirɛle Adam ne Hawa aduaba kõ bie wɔ Eden turo nanu, na ɔhã hyirɛle bɛ kyɛ sɛ bɛte bie bedi a bekowu.
Abɔfoɛ nanu kõ tele Nyameɛpiri so atua. Sɔ bɔfoɛ ne yeɛ ole Satan Abɔnzam.
Né Satan nguro kyɛ Adam ne Hawa kotie Yehowa. Yesɔ ti, ɔnate ewoo so hã hyirɛle Hawa kyɛ, sɛ odi aduaba ne bie a, ongowu na ɔkɔyɛ kyɛ Nyameɛpiri. Nakoso, né ɔlakalaka bɛ.—1 Timoteo 2:14.

- Wɔakyerɛw nsɛm yi wɔ Akuapem kasa mu
Manovo-Gounda St. Floris Ɔman Mmoa Yɛmmea yɛ ɔman mmɔnten so atrae ne UNESCO Wiase Agyapade a ɛwɔ Central African Republic mantam Bamingui-Bangoran, a ɛbɛn Chad hye so. Wɔkyerɛw too Wiase Agyapade Mmeae a wɔahyehyɛ no mu wɔ 1988 mu esiane nkwa ahorow a ɛwɔ mu nti.[1]
Nnomaa ahorow a ɛda nsow ne asono tuntum, asono, Sudan cheetahs, asono, asono a wɔn anim yɛ kɔkɔɔ, ne anantwinini, akraman, gyata ; nsu mu nnomaa ahorow pii nso wɔ atifi fam nsuyiri mmeae.

Tuo a wɔtotow guu abɔnten so atrae hɔ adwumayɛfo baanan so wɔ 1997 mfiase ne tebea a na ahobammɔ resɛe wɔ ɔkwan a ɛkɔ akyiri so no maa nkɔso adwuma ne nsrahwɛ nyinaa gyaee.[2]

Beaeɛ[sesa]
Abɔnten so atrae no wɔ Bamingui-Bangoran mantam no apuei fam awiei wɔ ɔman no atifi fam no fa kɛse no ara. Abɔnten so atrae no atifi fam hye ne amanaman ntam hye a ɛne Chad wɔ wɔ Aouk (Bahr) ne Kameur Asubɔnten no so. Apuei fam hye ne Vakaga Asubɔnten, atɔe fam hye ne Manovo Asubɔnten bɛyɛ 40 km wɔ N’Délé apuei fam, na anafo fam hye no yɛ Massif des Bongo abon no. Ndéle-Birao kwan no fa abɔnten so atrae no mu.

Wofiri Yerusalem a, wobɛtwa kilomita 3 ansa na woadu kuro bi a wɔfrɛ no Betania. Ná kuro no wɔ Ngo Bepɔ no nifa so. (Yohane 11:18) Yesu kɔɔ hɔ kɔsraa Marta ne ne nua Maria, na ɔkɔe no, wɔgyee no kama. Ná wɔne wɔn nuabarima Lasaro nyinaa yɛ Yesu nnamfo.
Obiara rennya sɛ Mesia no bɛba abɛsra no, enti na Marta ani abere reyɛ nnuane akɛse, efisɛ na ɔpɛ sɛ Yesu ani gye. Marta reyɛ aduane no nyinaa na ne nua Maria te Yesu nan ase retie no. Ɛyɛɛ kakra no, Marta bɛka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ: “Awurade, wonhunu sɛ
... 
baako bisaa no sɛ: “Awurade, kyerɛ yɛn sɛdeɛ wɔbɔ mpaeɛ, sɛdeɛ Yohane nso kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no.” (Luka 11:1) Bɛyɛ afe ne fã a na atwam no, Yesu kyerɛɛ n’asuafo sɛnea wɔmmɔ mpae bere a ɔrekasa wɔ Bepɔ so Asɛnka no mu no. (Mateo 6:9-13) Nanso ɛbɛyɛ sɛ saa bere no, na saa osuani no nni hɔ bi, enti Yesu san kaa mpaebɔ no mu nsɛntitiriw. Afei, ɔmaa mfatoho de kyerɛɛ sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ yɛbrɛ mpaebɔ da.
Ɔkaa sɛ: “Mo mu hwan na ɔwɔ adamfoɔ a ɔbɛkɔ ne nkyɛn dasuom akɔka akyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Damfo, fɛm me paanoo mmiɛnsa
...
no.”—Luka 11:9, 10.
Yesu wiei no, ɔde agya yɛɛ ntotoho de sii n’asɛm no so sɛ: “Mo mu hwan koraa na ɔyɛ agya a sɛ ne ba bisa no apataa a, ɔde ɔwɔ bɛhyɛ ne nsam na ɔremma no apataa? Anaasɛ sɛ ɔbisa kosua nso a, ɔde nyanyankyerɛ bɛhyɛ ne nsam? Enti, sɛ mo a moyɛ abɔnefoɔ mpo nim sɛdeɛ mode akyɛdeɛ pa ma mo mma a, hwɛ mprɛ dodoɔ ara a Agya a ɔwɔ soro no de honhom kronkron bɛma wɔn a wɔbisa no!” (Luka 11:11-13) Ɛno ma yɛn awerɛhyem paa sɛ yɛn Agya no pɛ sɛ ɔtie yɛn na ɔdi yɛn ahiade ho dwuma ma yɛn.

Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛahunu nokorɛ a ahinta wɔ Ntomadan no mu no? Sɛ yɛnya nimdeɛ wɔ nsuo ne Honhom asɛmpa a ɛyɛ adeɛ a ɛfa Ntomadan no ho nko a, na yɛbɛtumi anya nteaseɛ ne asɛmmisa yi ho nyiano.
Nokwasɛm ne sɛ, bibire, asaawa a ɛbere dum, koogyan, ne asaawa fitaa a wɔafira a wɔda no adi wɔ Ntomadan no ano pono a ɛwɔ adihɔ no kyerɛ yɛn Yesu Kristo nnwuma a ɛwɔ Apam Foforɔ berɛ no mu, a agye nnipa nyinaa nkwa no. Wɔ saa kwan yi so no, Asɛm a ɛwɔ Apam Dadaa Ntomadan no mu, ne Asɛm a ɛwɔ Apam Foforɔ mu no wɔ ayɔnkofa ne nkabomu te sɛ asaawa fitaa a wɔafira no. Nanso awerɛhosɛm ne sɛ, nokorɛ yi ahinta akyɛre yie wɔ obiara a ɔhwehwɛ nokorɛ no akyiri kwan wɔ Kristosom mu no.
Yesu Kristo baa asase yi so no, Yohane bɔɔ no asu, na ɔhwiee ne mogya guiɛ wɔ asɛnnua no so. Sɛ yɛante aseɛ annye nsuo ne Honhom asɛmpa no anni a, yɛn mu biara nni hɔ a ɔbɛtumi ahunu nokorɛ a wɔada no adie wɔ Ntomadan no mu no. Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛn nyinaa hunu na yɛgye nokorɛ a ada ne ho adi akyerɛ wɔ bibire, asaawa a ɛbere dum, koogyan, ne asaawa fitaa a wɔafira a na ɛwɔ Ntomadan no ano pono no die.

Adwene-Gyinae
Wɔ siee ayaresabea. Ayaresabea no ne din no yɛ Witkoppen Health and Welfare Centre.
Hemfa?: Johannesburg.
Mberebɛn?: 1946.
Woana?: Nɛɛseni abiasa siee ayaresabea no. Manegya no yɛ dɔktanyi Jean Bassett.
Adɛn?: Ayaresabea no boa yareɛ nkorɔfo firi Diepkloof, Kyasands na Lion Parks.
Wɔ yɛ HIV nsɔhwɛ na TB nsɔhwɛ.
Wɔ sa yareba koankorɔ na yareba adwene mu yare.
Ɛho Mmuaeɛ
Ayaresabea no hu nkorɔfo bosoome biara 8500.
Mpanyin tua R70.
Mba tua R50.
Nkorɔfo dadaw na nkorɔfo dɛmdie tua hwee.
Nyiano 2010
30% yɛee mmmamforafo.
46% yɛee obi a ɔnnyɛ edwuma.
Akatua saa ara no yɛee R1700.

1, 2. Kpuya boni a menli dɔɔnwo biza a?
NYEVILE mɔɔ tu ba sua zo la zɛkyele namule bie. Nrenyia bie totole etu wɔ asɔne sua bie anu maanle menli dɔɔnwo bodale na bie mɔ wule. Kansa hunle ninli bie mɔɔ lɛ ngakula nnu la.

...

Noa bere sofo no mu dodow no ara yɛɛ nneɛma bɔne. Genesis 6:5
Adam ne Hawa woo mma, na nnipa yɛɛ bebree wɔ asase so. Bere rekɔ so no, abɔfo binom kɔkaa Satan ho ma wɔtew atua.
Wɔbaa asase so na wɔfaa nnipa honam duraa wɔn ho sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobetumi aware nnipa mmabea. Mmea no woo mma soronko a na wɔyɛ keka na wɔn ho nso yɛ den.
Nnipa abɔnefo bɛhyɛɛ asase so ma. Bible ka sɛ: ‘Onipa de abɔnefosɛm hyɛɛ asase so mã, na na ne komam nsusuwii nyinaa yɛ bɔne bere nyinaa.’
Noa tiee Onyankopɔn, na ɔyɛɛ adaka. Genesis 6:13, 14, 18, 19, 22
Ná Noa yɛ onipa pa. Yehowa ka kyerɛɛ Noa sɛ ɔde nsuyiri kɛse bi bɛsɛe nnipa abɔnefo no.
Afei Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Noa sɛ ɔnyɛ hyɛn anaa adaka kɛse bi, na ɔmfa n’abusua ne mmoa ahorow nyinaa bi nkɔ mu.
Noa bɔɔ nkurɔfo kɔkɔ wɔ Nsuyiri a na ɛreba no ho, nanso wɔantie no. Ebinom serew Noa; afoforo nso tan no.
Bere a Noa yɛɛ adaka no wiei no, ɔde mmoa no kɔɔ mu.

NÁ BERE aso sɛ wɔyɛ nhyiam titiriw bi wɔ Yerusalem. Ná Ɔhene Dawid aboaboa ne mpanyimfo, ahemfie mpanyimfo, ne ne nnɔmmarima nyinaa ano. Ɔde asɛm bi too gua maa wɔn a wɔahyiam no nyinaa ani gyei. Ɛne sɛ, na Yehowa apaw Dawid ba Solomon sɛ onsi ofie soronko bi a wɔbɛsom nokware Nyankopɔn no wɔ hɔ. Onyankopɔn nam ne honhom so de ofie no ho nsusuwso maa Israel hene Dawid a na n’ani afi no, na ɔno nso de maa Solomon. Dawid kae sɛ: “Adwuma no sõ, efisɛ abankɛse no nyɛ onipa dea, na mmom Yehowa Nyanko
... 
raa. Nokwasɛm ne sɛ, ɔman no “dii ahurusi sɛ wofi wɔn pɛ mu de biribi aba, efisɛ koma nyinaa mu na wofi yii ntoboa maa Yehowa.”
Mfehaha pii akyi no, Yehowa de biribi a ɛsen asɔrefie no sii hɔ. Ɛno ne honhom fam asɔrefie kɛse no. Ɛyɛ nhyehyɛe a Yehowa ayɛ a ɛma nnipa tumi fa Yesu afɔrebɔ no so som no. (Heb. 9:11, 12) Ɛnnɛ, ɔkwan bɛn na Yehowa nam so repata nkurɔfo aba ne nkyɛn? Ɔnam asuafoyɛ adwuma a yɛreyɛ no so. (Mat. 28:19, 20) Asuafoyɛ adwuma a yɛreyɛ no nti, afe biara yɛne nnipa ɔpepem pii s
...
hyiam. Wunnye nni sɛ asɛmpa no a yɛreka akyerɛ obiara no yɛ adwuma kɛse a mfaso wɔ so?
Esiane sɛ Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo dɔ Onyankopɔn ne wɔn yɔnko nnipa, na wonim sɛ ehia sɛ wɔde nsi ne ahokeka yɛ Ahenni ho asɛmpaka adwuma no nti, woyi wɔn yam ‘de biribi hyɛ wɔn nsam ma Yehowa,’ kyerɛ sɛ, wofi wɔn pɛ mu yi ntoboa. Sɛ yɛde ‘yɛn ahonyade hyɛ Yehowa anuonyam,’ na yehu sɛnea wɔde nokwaredi ne nyansa de saa nneɛma no reyɛ adwuma a ɛsõ sen adwuma biara wɔ nnipa asetena nyinaa mu no a, ɛma yɛn ani gye paa!

Abraham Kweku Fokuo
- Wɔakyerɛw nsɛm yi wɔ Akuapem kasa mu
Abraham Kwaku Fokuo yɛ Ghana na ɔka mmrahyɛbedwafoɔ a ɛdii kan wɔ Ghana adehyeman a ɛtɔ so nan ne ho na ɔgyinaa hɔ maa Assin atifi fam mpɛsoa no wɔ kyiniiɛ amanyɔkuo National Democratic Congress (NDC) no ase.[1]
Abrabɔ ahyɛaseɛ ne Nhomasua[sesa]
Yɛwoo Fokuo wɔ Ɔsanaa bosome ne da a ɛtɔ so nwɔtwe wɔ afe apem ahankron ne aduonan nwɔtwe mu. Ɔkɔɔ suapɔn ne asuae kunini wɔ Ɔguaa sukuupɔn ne Howard University sukuupɔn a edidi soɔ yi a ɔde nyaa
... 
ahyɛbedwa abatoɔ no ase.
Yɛyii no kyerɛɛ wɔ Ghana adehyeman a ɛtɔ so nan ne mu wɔ Ɔpɛpɔn bosome ne da a ɛtɔ so nson wɔ afe apem ahankron ne aduokron mmiɛnsa bere yɛbɔɔ ne din sɛ w'adi nkonim wɔ afe apem ahankron ne aduokron mmienu wɔ Ghana nyinaa abatoɔ a yɛtoo no Ɔpɛnimaa bosome ne da ɛtɔ so aduonkron wɔ afe apem ahankron ne aduokron mmienu ne mu.
Ɔdii ne mfeɛ nan wɔ mmrahyɛbedwafie wie no, Abraham no ara amanyɔkuo mu nipa Florence Kumi na ɔbɛtuu no. Ɔdii Kwabena Karikari - Apau a ɔyɛ Ɔsono ama
...
wɔ akokɔ kɔkɔɔ amanyɔkuo ( CPP ) no ɛnnya mma biara. Florence nyaa mma mpem aduonan ne aduowɔtwe a ɛgyina hɔ ma ɔha nkyekyɛmu aduonan nwɔtwe ne akyiripɔ aduosia wɔ mma dodoɔ no nyinaa mu. Ɛnam wie so maa yɛde yii no wɔ Ɔpɛpɔn bosome ne da a ɛtɔ so nson wɔ afe apem ahankron ne aduokron nson abatoɔ no mu.[2]
Beaɛ a menyaa mmoa firi yɛ[sesa]

Nanguan (China kasa: 南管; pinyin: Nánguǎn; Pe̍h-ōe-jī: Lâm-kóan; lit. ‘anafo fam paipu’; nanyin, nanyue, xianguan, anaa nanqu nso) yɛ Chinafo tsetse ndwom kwan a efi China kesee fam mantɔw mu a ɔwɔ Fujian.[1] Ɔyɛ dza agye dzin nso wɔ Taiwan, tsitsir Lukang a ɔwɔ atɔe fam mpoano, na Chinafo a wɔwɔ Amannɔnye a wɔwɔ Asia Kɛse Fam Epuei nso mu.[2]

Diaspora[sesa mu | sesa ekyirsɛm]
Efi afeha a ɔtɔ do duesuon (17) mu no, Hoklofo a wotu fii Fujian kɔɔ Taiwan no dze aman ndwom a ɔnnyɛ ɔkwan biara do na edwindadze na opera ndwom a wɔayɛ no amandze kɛse a wɔkyerɛkyerɛ wɔ amateur ekuw ahorow mu tse dɛ beiguan na nanguan kɔe. Wobotum ehu Hoklofo akɛse a wɔatu akɔtra mbea fofor nso wɔ Malaysia, Guangdong, Hong Kong, Philippines, Singapore, Burma, Thailand na Indonesia, baabi a wɔtaa frɛ hɔn Hokkien no.
Nanguan fekuw ebien na ɔwɔ Singapore[6] na k
...
uan ndwontofo kuw bi wɔ 1960 mfe no ahyɛase mu hɔ, na Fuzhou aman ndwom kuw bi wɔ hɔ, a wɔdze sii hɔ wɔ 1990 mu.

Nhoma pa tɔn pii wɔ Intanɛt so, nanso worennyɛ programmer denam nhoma a wobɛkenkan so. Sɛ wobɛsua Java na woabɛyɛ programmer a, ɛsɛ sɛ wokyerɛw code pii. CodeGym b> yɛ intanɛt so Java programming adesua a ɛwɔ 80% adeyɛ ne 20% a ɛho hia Java nsusuwii. Eyi ne nea wuhia na woabɛyɛ Java developer ankasa.
nanso ɛwɔ hɔ pii (dodow ne pii). Wobɛkyerɛw Java code tɔn. Ɛdɔɔso ara kwa sɛ ɛbɛma wo osuahu a wuhia na ama woanya adwuma.
ani!
Ɛnsɛ sɛ adesua yɛ mfonoe! Ɛno nti na yɛn Java nkyerɛkyerɛ no de akwan a aba so foforo di dwuma de ma w'adesua yɛ mmerɛw, ɛyɛ anigye, na ɛsow aba: mfoniniyɛ, abasɛm, nkannyan, agodie, ne akwan foforo dumien abien a wunnyaa bi mpo wɔate ho asɛm. Ɛte sɛ nea ɛyɛ anigye, huh?
W'amemene no benya apɔw-mu-teɛteɛ a ɛkyɛn so! Obiara a obedu awiei no benya nnɔnhwerew 500+ Java programming practice. Ɛno yɛ aniberesɛm a wɔbɔ sɛ wobedi nkonim. Na adwuma nso.

Awurade nne wɔ ahum mu
1Mo ɔsorosorofo, monkamfo Awurade; monkamfo n’anuonyam ne ne tumi. 2 Monkamfo ne din a anuonyam ahyɛ no ma no. Sɛ Kronkronni no pue a, monkotow no. 3 Wɔte Awurade nne wɔ ɛpo so. Anuonyam Nyankopɔn bɔ aprannaa ma ne nne tra ɛpo so. 4 Wɔte Awurade nne wɔ tumi ne ahoɔden mu. 5 Awurade nne bubu sida, Lebanon sida mpo. 6 Ɔma Lebanon ne Sirion mmepɔw nyinaa huruhuruw te sɛ nantwi ba. 7 Awurade nne ma aprannaa pae. 8 Ne nne ma sare so wosow. Ɔwosow Kadeɛ sare. 9 Awurade nne wosow adum ma ɛso nhaban porow gu bere a obiara a ɔwɔ ne Fi no teɛm se, “Anuonyam nka Onyankopɔn!” no.
10 Awurade di nsu a emu dɔ nyinaa so; odi hene daa daa. 11 Awurade ma ne nkurɔfo ahoɔden, hyira wɔn, ma wɔn asomdwoe nso.

Nnwom 75Nkwa Asem (NA-TWI)
Ɔtemmufo Nyankopɔn
75 Yɛda wo ase, O Onyankopɔn, yɛda wo ase! Yɛda wo kɛseyɛ adi ka anwonwade a woayɛ. 2 Onyankopɔn ka se, “Mahyɛ bere a mede bebu atɛn na mebu atɛntrenee. 3 Ɛwom, abɔde biara ho popo na asase ankasa wosow nanso mɛma ne fapem ayɛ den.
4 “Meka kyerɛ amumɔyɛfo se, wɔnnyɛ ahantan. 5 Meka kyerɛ wɔn se wonnyae wɔn ahohoahoa no.” 6 Atemmu no remfi apuei anaa atɔe anaa atifi anaaa anafo. 7 Onyankopɔn ne ɔtemmufo no. Obebu ebinom fɔ na wagyaa ebinom nso. 8 Awurade kita kuruwa a n’abufuw nsa a ano yɛ den wɔ mu wɔ ne nsam. Ohwie gu ma amumɔyɛfo nyinaa nom. Wnom ne nyinaa a sɔpɛ koraa nka.
9 Nanso merennyae Yakob Nyankopɔn ho asɛnka da, na merennyae ayeyi dwom a meto ma no no nso da. 10 Obebubu amumɔyɛfo tumi mu, nanso ɔtreneeni tumi mu bɛhyɛ den.

Loango Ɔman Mmoa Yɛmmea (National Park) yɛ ɔman mmɔnten so atrae a ɛwɔ Gabon atɔe fam. Ɛbɔ mpoano atrae ahorow ho ban, a Iguéla Asubɔnten a ne kɛse yɛ kilomita 220 no fa bi ka ho, a ɛyɛ Afrika atɔe fam atare nhyehyɛe a wɔtaa yɛ a wɔbɔ ho ban wɔ ɔman mmɔnten so atrae bi mu ho nhwɛso titiriw biako pɛ.
Loango Ɔman Mmoa Yɛmmea a ɛwɔ Nkomi ne Ndogo Lagoons ntam no yɛ Afrika atɔe fam mpoano abohene ankasa. Abɔde ho nimdefo M
... 
 edi kan wɔ Loango Ɔman Mmoa Yɛmmea ne ne mpɔtam de hyɛɛ mpɔtam hɔ wuram mmoa ne wuram nsase a wɔde bedi dwuma daa ho nkuran. Wɔ November 2002 mu no, Ɔmampanyin Omar Bongo Ondimba de Gabon sii asase mfonini no so denneennen denam ɔman mmɔnten so atrae foforo 13 a ɔyɛe wɔ Gabon no so. Sɛ wɔka ne nyinaa bom a, mmɔnten so atrae dumiɛnsa a wɔayɛ no gyina hɔ ma Gabon asase no 10%. Mmoa Yɛmmea a ɛyɛ nwonwa kɛse wɔ nhyehyɛe yi mu biako ne Loango Ɔman Mmoa Yɛmmea. Nkuraase kakraa bi pɛ na ɛwɔ abɔnten so
...
di dwuma de kyere mpataa ne mpataa. Wɔde nsa na ɛkyere asase so krak. Wɔde atuo a ɛkorɔn ne atuo a wɔde tow tuo asi abɔmmɔ nneɛma a wɔde di dwuma wɔ amanne kwan so te sɛ agyan ne agyan, peaw, deadfall ne spring afiri ananmu. Wɔtwa nnuan afoforo pii wɔ wuram wɔ kwae mu, sava, anaa mpoano, te sɛ mpɔtorɔ nkesua.

NYAN! JUNE 2014
Dɛn na Ɛma Obi Yɛ Adamfo Pa?
Awerɛhosɛm ne sɛ nnamfo pa ho ayɛ nna nnɛ. Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ ɛba saa? Dɛn na ɛbɛma woayɛ adamfo pa? Hwɛ Bible mu afotu a wubetumi de ayɛ adwuma.
Nea ɛwom bi nie: Canada ayaresabea a ɛyɛ awoɔ aduro no, adwennwene abɛtɔ wɔn so; ade a amanfoɔ betumi de asi nnam anan; seesei nkurɔfo a wɔka sɛ Onyankopɔn nni hɔ hyira aware so wɔ Ireland.
Nea Priestley kyerɛw nyinaa, nyansahu mu oo, nyamesom mu oo, wanni atetesɛm ne amammerɛ akyi, mmom deɛ ɔkyerɛwee nyinaa gyina nsɛm a ɛyɛ nokware turodoo so. Kenkan na hu sɛnea nneɛma a ɔkyerɛwee ne nea ohui de too gua asesa nkurɔfo adwene abesi nnɛ.

Sedee wᴐde kyirebennye homa susu hwe se dan bi si hᴐ ntentensoᴐ ana ente saa no, Onyankopon ma yen ne mma nsᴐhwe de hwᴐe se yeresi yen gyidie fie wᴐ ntentensoᴐ te se dee Onyankopon de yee Hiob, Shadrak, Meshak ne Abednego no. Nanso ne nhyira di akyire awiee no bere biara.
Kristo Ahnsahnghong ne Nyankopɔn Na akyere yen anuanom a yeresi yen gyidie fie nne yi se, se Onyankopon sᴐ wiase nyinaa hwe a, ᴐbehwehwe obiara nsem, na nneyee ne n’akoma na ᴐde ᴐhaw musuo aba wᴐn a wᴐnni gyidie no a wᴐ nwiinwii ne wᴐkasakasa no so. WᴐAsian nso akyere anuanom se wᴐndwene ᴐsoro ahenman no ne Onyankopon ho nko ara wᴐ ade nyinaa ne tebea biara mu.
Sei na ᴐmaa mehunuie, Na hwe, AWURADE gyina ᴐfasuo kyirebenn so, Na kyirebennye homa kura ne nsam . . . Na AWURADE kaa se: Hwe, mede kyirebennye homabesi me man Israel mfimfini, Merenkᴐ so mensiane wᴐn bio.
Amos 7:7–8
“na mede owuo bekum ne mma, na asafo no nyinaa ahunu se, mene dee ᴐhwehwe adwene ne akoma mu. Na mema mo mu biara sedee mo nnwuma tee.”

26 Yesu ne n’asuafo no twaa po no beduu Gerasefo asase a ɛne Galilea di nhwɛanim no so. 27 Yesu fi ɔkorow no mu sii fam pɛ, ɔbarima bi a ahohommɔne ahyɛ no ma akyɛ a ɔda adagyaw na ɔnte fie, na mmom ɔte amusiei a aboda mu na ɔdeda no behyiaa no. 28 Ohuu Yesu no, ɔteɛɛm, kotow ne nan ase san teɛteɛɛm se, “Yesu, Ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn Ba, dɛn na wo ne me wɔ yɛ? Mesrɛ wo, nyɛ me ayayade biara.”
29 Ɔkaa saa asɛm yi, efisɛ, na Yesu ateɛteɛ ahohommɔ
...
Ɔduu fie hɔ no, wamma obiara anka ne ho ankɔ ɔdan a abofra no da mu no mu gye Petro, Yohane, Yakobo ne abofra no awofo nko ara. 52 Na nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ no nyinaa resu, di awerɛhow. Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Munnsu, onwui na wada.” 53 Wɔserew no dii ne ho fɛw, efisɛ, na wɔn de, wonim pefee sɛ wawu.
54 Yesu soo ne nsa ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Me ba, sɔre!” 55 Amonom hɔ ara, ɔsɔree na Yesu kae se wɔmma no biribi nni. 56 N’awofo no ho dwiriw wɔn yiye nanso Yesu bɔɔ wɔn ano se, wɔnnka nea asi no nnkyerɛ obiara.

Bere a Paulo ne Silas gu afiase no, wɔtoo dwom yii Nyankopɔn ayɛ. (Aso 16:25) Yɛn bere yi so nso, yɛn mfɛfo gyidifo a na wɔwɔ Sachsenhausen nneduaban mu wɔ Nasi Germany too Ahenni nnwom. Bere a wotwaa wɔn asu kɔɔ Siberia nso, wɔtoo Ahenni nnwom. Nhwɛso yi ma yehu sɛ nnwom wɔ tumi paa. Enti sɛ Kristofo rehyia sɔhwɛ a, etumi ma wonya akokoduru.
Ɛrenkyɛ yebenya nnwom nhoma foforo no wɔ kasa pii mu. Yɛato din ‘Momfa Anigye Nto Dwom’ Mma Yehowa. Sɛ yenya yɛn deɛ a, yensua nnwom no wɔ abusua som ase ma emu nsɛm no nka yɛn tirim. (Efe 5:19) Yɛyɛ no saa na sɛ daakye bi yehyia sɔhwɛ a, honhom kronkron no bɛkaakae yɛn. Ahenni nnwom betumi aboa yɛn ama yɛde yɛn adwene asi yɛn anidaso no so. Sɛ yehyia sɔhwɛ a, ebetumi ahyɛ yɛn den ama yɛagyina mu. Sɛ yɛwɔ anigye mu nso a, emu nsɛm no betumi akanyan yɛn ama ‘yɛde anigye ato,’ na ahyɛ yɛn anidaso mu gya. (1Be 15:16; Dw 33:1-3) Enti momma yensua Ahenni nnwom no, na ɛbɛboa yɛn paa!

Fatboy Po mu Nkyene Pomade
Bo a wɔbɔ daa
$13.99
Adetɔn
Texture ne wie a ɛpo nkyene a wɔde petepete so a ɛyɛ mmerɛw sɛ cream pomade.
Innovative lightweight cream a ɛbɔ saa beachy texture no, bere a moisturizing na ɛma abɔde mu nsu a ɛsen no kɔ so.
SƐNEA WƆYƐ
Fa sika a ne kɛse te sɛ dime petepete wo nsateaa ntam na fa sɛnea ɛfata. Fa gu ti nhwi a ɛyɛ nsu so na fa mframa-dry anaasɛ diffuse ma abɔde mu mpoano nhwi.
BERƐ BƐN
Bere a wopɛ sɛ woyɛ te sɛ nea wode da no traa mpoano na wowɔ The Perfect hair, nanso daa. Po Nkyene Pomade ma wo mmɔdenbɔ biara nwene ne mpaapaemu a ɛnyɛ crunchiness anaasɛ dehydration wo amammerɛ nkyene aduru no. Fa no sɛ worekɔ po mu a wode conditioner a w’ani gye ho kɛse ahyɛ wo ti nhwi mu; its like that.
ADƐN
Sea Kelp ne Algae a wɔayiyi no ma saa pomade yi yɛ nea nnuru a ekum ɔyare mmoawa pii na ɛma ti nhwi no nya ahoɔden na ɛhyerɛn. Akutu ngo ne Shea Butter boa ma nsu a ɛwɔ mu no to mu, na ɛma ahoɔden yɛ kɛse bere a ɛbɔ wo ti nhwi ho ban fi UV a ɛsɛe ho na esiw n’awiei a ɛpaapae ano no.
PRO ATIRIMKA
Fa gu ti nhwi a ɛyɛ nsu so na fa bɔ ma ɛnyɛ 2 wɔ 1 mu; smoothing na taming frizz ne nkyene a ɛho hia nyinaa kura. Fa gu ti nhwi a ayow so na scrunch mu ma ɛnyɛ texture ne chunky mpaapaemu.

Ɔkwan Bɛn so na Mede Exponential Smoothing Di Dwuma? How Do I Use Exponential Smoothing in Akan
So worehwehwɛ ɔkwan a wobɛfa so de exponential smoothing adi dwuma ma ayɛ nea mfaso wɔ so? Exponential smoothing yɛ ɔkwan a tumi wom a wɔfa so hyɛ nkɔm a ebetumi aboa wo ma woaka nsɛm a ebesisi daakye ho nkɔm pɛpɛɛpɛ. Wɔ saa asɛm yi mu no, yɛbɛhwehwɛ sɛnea wode exponential smoothing bedi dwuma ne mfaso a ebetumi de aba wo nkɔmhyɛ mmɔdenbɔ so. Yɛbɛsan nso aka exponential smoothing ahodoɔ ne sɛdeɛ wobɛp
... 
 bo ankasa a ɛsom ma bere t, a yɛ ade a ɛma ɛyɛ mmerɛw ma level fã no, na Y yɛ ade a ɛma ɛyɛ mmerɛw ma trend fã no. Wɔnam sɔhwɛ ne mfomso so na ɛkyerɛ nneɛma a ɛma ɛyɛ mmerɛw no, na gyinapɛn ahorow a eye sen biara no gyina data a wɔahyehyɛ no so.
Wobɛyɛ dɛn Bu Holt Linear Exponential Smoothing ho akontaa? (How Do You Calculate Holt's Linear Exponential Smoothing in Akan?)

...
ɛm mu nhwehwɛmufo ani gye ho, efisɛ ebetumi aboa wɔn ma wɔahyɛ nkɔm a edi mu kɛse wɔ daakye gua so nsɛm ho.

Yosef, Maria ne wɔn ba Yesu tenaa Nasaret. Ná wɔn mmabarima ne wɔn mmabaa a aka nso ka wɔn ho. Ná Yosef yɛ duadwumfo adwuma de hwɛ n’abusua. Yosef kyerɛkyerɛɛ n’abusua no Yehowa ne ne Mmara ho asɛm. Ná ɔne n’abusua no kɔ hyiadan mu daa kɔsom. Afe biara nso, na wɔkɔ Yerusalem kodi Twam Afahyɛ no.
Bere a Yesu dii mfe 12 no, ɔne n’abusua twaa kwantenten kɔɔ Yerusalem sɛnea na wɔtaa yɛ no. Ná nnipa a wɔrebedi Twam Afahyɛ no dɔɔso paa wɔ kurow no mu. Afahyɛ no akyi, Yosef ne Maria sii mu sɛ wɔresan akɔ wɔn fie. Wɔn adwene yɛɛ wɔn sɛ ebia Yesu afra nnipadɔm a wɔretu kwan no mu. Nanso bere a wɔhwehwɛɛ no wɔ wɔn abusuafo mu no, wɔanhu no.
Yosef ne Maria san wɔn akyi kɔɔ Yerusalem. Wɔde nnansa kyini hwehwɛɛ wɔn ba no. Awiei koraa no, wɔkɔɔ asɔrefie hɔ. Woduu hɔ no, wohuu sɛ Yesu te akyerɛkyerɛfo no mfinimfini ayɛ aso retie wɔn. Ná ɔrebisabisa wɔn nsɛm a ɛtɔ asom nso. Akyerɛkyerɛfo no ani gyee Yesu ho paa. Enti wɔn nso fii ase bisabisaa no nsɛm. Mmuae a Yesu de maa wɔn no maa wɔn ho dwiriw wɔn. Wohuu sɛ Yesu te Yehowa Mmara no ase.
Bere a Yesu yerae no, ɛhaw Yosef ne Maria paa. Enti Maria kaa sɛ: ‘Me ba, yɛahwehwɛ wo abrɛ! Ɛhe na wokɔe?’ Yesu kaa sɛ: ‘Munnim sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ metena m’Agya fie?’
Yesu ne n’awofo san kɔɔ wɔn fie wɔ Nasaret. Yosef kyerɛɛ Yesu duadwumfo adwuma no. Bere a Yesu yɛ aberante no, wohwɛ a, na ne suban te sɛn? Bere a Yesu renyin no, onyaa nyansa pii. Afei nso, Onyankopɔn ne nnipa nyinaa pɛɛ n’asɛm paa.

Samuel mmofraase pɛɛ na ɔkɔtenaa asɔrefie yɛɛ adwuma. Asɔrefie hɔ na na nkurɔfo kɔsom Yehowa. Wunim nea ɛyɛe a Samuel kɔtenaa asɔrefie hɔ? Nea edi kan no, ma yensua Samuel maame Hanah ho nsɛm.
Ná Hanah fi bere tenten pɛ sɛ ɔwo ba, nanso na onnya bi. Enti ɔbɔɔ mpae srɛɛ Yehowa sɛ ɔmmoa no. Ɔhyɛɛ Yehowa bɔ sɛ sɛ ɔwo ɔbabarima a, ɔbɛma wakɔtena asɔrefie hɔ ayɛ adwuma. Yehowa tiee ne mpaebɔ no, na ɔwoo ɔbabarima. Ɔtoo ne din Samuel. Hanah dii ne bɔhyɛ so, enti bere a Samuel dii mfe abiɛsa anaa anan 
... 
sɔrefie hɔ. Ná ne mmabarima baanu nso yɛ adwuma wɔ hɔ. Kae sɛ, na asɔrefie hɔ yɛ baabi a wɔsom Onyankopɔn. Ɛhɔ yɛ baabi a na ɛsɛ sɛ nkurɔfo yɛ adepa. Nanso, na Eli mma no reyɛ nneɛma bɔne paa wɔ hɔ. Samuel huu nea na wɔreyɛ no. So Samuel yɛɛ nneɛma bɔne a na Eli mma no reyɛ no bi?
Sɛ wohwɛ a, dɛn na anka ɛsɛ sɛ Eli yɛ ne mma baanu no?
Da koro anadwo bi, bere a na Samuel ada no, ɔtee sɛ obi refrɛ no sɛ: ‘Samuel!’ Otuu mmirika kɔɔ Eli hɔ, nanso Eli ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: ‘Memfrɛɛ wo.’ Ɔsan tee ɛnne no n
...
o sɛ sɛ ɔte ɛnne no bio a, ɔnka sɛ: ‘Yehowa, mepa wo kyɛw, kasa, na meretie.’ Enti Samuel yɛɛ saa. Afei Yehowa ka kyerɛɛ Samuel sɛ: ‘Ka kyerɛ Eli sɛ bɔne a n’abusua no ayɛ nti mɛtwe wɔn aso.’ Sɛ wohwɛ a, so na ɛbɛyɛ mmerɛw ama Samuel sɛ ɔbɛka asɛm yi akyerɛ Eli anaa?
Samuel yɛɛ nhwɛso pa a yebetumi asua. Ɛwom sɛ ohui sɛ nnipa binom reyɛ nneɛma bɔne de, nanso ɔno de, ɔyɛɛ nneɛma pa. Wo nso ɛ? So wubesuasua Samuel, na woakɔ so ayɛ nneɛma pa? Sɛ woyɛ saa a, wobɛma Yehowa ne w’awofo nyinaa ani agye.

Nyew. Yɛgye Jesus dzi, ɔkãe dɛ: “Emi nye ɔkwan no, nye nokwar no, nye nkwa no; obi mmba Egya no hɔ, gyedɛ ɔnam mo do.
” (John 14:6) Yɛgye dzi dɛ Jesus fii sor baa asaase yi do, na ɔdze ne dasanyi nkwa a odzi mu bɛmae dɛ werdam afɔrbɔ. (Matthew 20:28) No wu nye no wusoɛr no ma ɔyɛ yie ma hɔn a wɔkyerɛ no mu gyedzi no dɛ wobenya onnyiewiei nkwa. (John 3:16) Yɛsan so gye dzi dɛ sesei, Jesus ridzi Hen wɔ Nyankopɔn no sor Ahendzi no a ɔnnkyɛr ɔdze asomdwee bɛbrɛ asaase nyinara no mu. (Nyikyerɛ 11:15) Naaso, yɛgye Jesus asɛm a ɔkãe yi so to mu, ɔkãe dɛ: “Egya no sõ sen me.
” (John 14:28) Iyi ntsi yɛnnsom Jesus, osiandɛ yɛgye dzi dɛ ɔnnyɛ ɔno nye Adze Nyina do Tumfo Nyankopɔn no.

LUZIA TƆ GU NE NAN BENKUM SO. Ɔyɛ abofra no, onyaa yare bi a yɛfrɛ no polio anaa mmubui. Ɛyɛ yare bi a ɛsan pa ara, na ɛkyere onipa no nkwaadɔm. Bere a Luzia dii mfe 16 no, na ɔyɛ adwuma ma ɔbaa bi. Ɔbaa no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Onyankopɔn de mmubui twee w’aso, efisɛ woyɛɛ wo maame so asoɔden na woammu no.” Mfe bi akyi no, na Luzia da so ara kae sɛnea asɛm no ma odii yaw no.

...
